trans-unit.source: I am sure you will need spare parts eventually.
trans-unit.target: I am sure you will need spare parts eventually.

trans-unit.source: We have no use for slaves. Your damaged eye intrigues us.
trans-unit.target: We have no use for slaves. Your damaged eye intrigues us.

trans-unit.source: We left your world because there was nothing left of value.
trans-unit.target: We left your world because there was nothing left of value.

trans-unit.source: You will have to prove you are more than slavelings.
trans-unit.target: You will have to prove you are more than slavelings.

trans-unit.source: You have to understand that Torian oils are a delicacy. If anything, we are the victims here.
trans-unit.target: You have to understand that Torian oils are a delicacy. If anything, we are the victims here.

trans-unit.source: We lost many to other species as well. We may share enemies.
trans-unit.target: We lost many to other species as well. We may share enemies.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to exploring the universe together.
trans-unit.target: We look forward to exploring the universe together.

trans-unit.source: You have a friend in us.
trans-unit.target: You have a friend in us.

trans-unit.source: My advice to you is that you stay out of our way.
trans-unit.target: My advice to you is that you stay out of our way.

trans-unit.source: You will be able to judge us on our chara-excellent prices and sales.
trans-unit.target: You will be able to judge us on our chara-excellent prices and sales.

trans-unit.source: No one should struggle alone. You may count on us.
trans-unit.target: No one should struggle alone. You may count on us.

trans-unit.source: We are open to new ideas.
trans-unit.target: We are open to new ideas.

trans-unit.source: Our adorable eyes and sharp teeth greet you and your way.
trans-unit.target: Our adorable eyes and sharp teeth greet you and your way.

trans-unit.source: We have no need for superstition.
trans-unit.target: We have no need for superstition.

trans-unit.source: We are big supporters of THE WAY. The statue of Kyndras is one of our best sellers.
trans-unit.target: We are big supporters of THE WAY. The statue of Kyndras is one of our best sellers.

trans-unit.source: We accept your friendship but not your theology.
trans-unit.target: We accept your friendship but not your theology.

trans-unit.source: You have nothing to fear from us.
trans-unit.target: You have nothing to fear from us.

trans-unit.source: Were those eyes at cute as ours?
trans-unit.target: Were those eyes at cute as ours?

trans-unit.source: Your civilization is already dead. You just don't know it yet.
trans-unit.target: Your civilization is already dead. You just don't know it yet.

trans-unit.source: We took your homeworld because you were too weak.
trans-unit.target: We took your homeworld because you were too weak.

trans-unit.source: We are always here to help.
trans-unit.target: We are always here to help.

trans-unit.source: We chase the light, looking for life at every star.
trans-unit.target: We chase the light, looking for life at every star.

trans-unit.source: We carry the tools of our own protection. You have yet to encounter the filth we have.
trans-unit.target: We carry the tools of our own protection. You have yet to encounter the filth we have.

trans-unit.source: You seriously look like a dragon.
trans-unit.target: You seriously look like a dragon.

trans-unit.source: We have our own interests to attend to.
trans-unit.target: We have our own interests to attend to.

trans-unit.source: You may be a useful ally in what is to come.
trans-unit.target: You may be a useful ally in what is to come.

trans-unit.source: That seems a little ironic coming from you.
trans-unit.target: That seems a little ironic coming from you.

trans-unit.source: We hope we can find a peaceful future together.
trans-unit.target: We hope we can find a peaceful future together.

trans-unit.source: We are more alive than a fleshing ever could be.
trans-unit.target: We are more alive than a fleshing ever could be.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps together we can both return to our homeworlds.
trans-unit.target: Perhaps together we can both return to our homeworlds.

trans-unit.source: There is always work for a 3 meter tall dragon.
trans-unit.target: There is always work for a 3 meter tall dragon.

trans-unit.source: We prefer to keep our dealings in the light.
trans-unit.target: We prefer to keep our dealings in the light.

trans-unit.source: Thank you. I'd love to hear so much about your sector first.
trans-unit.target: Thank you. I'd love to hear so much about your sector first.

trans-unit.source: I believe you are a species we can do business with.
trans-unit.target: I believe you are a species we can do business with.

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful that we can forge a future together.
trans-unit.target: We are hopeful that we can forge a future together.

trans-unit.source: I'm not sure we are going to get along.
trans-unit.target: I'm not sure we are going to get along.

trans-unit.source: The laws of supply and demand are not bounded by biology.
trans-unit.target: The laws of supply and demand are not bounded by biology.

trans-unit.source: That giant rifle doesn't look very welcoming.
trans-unit.target: That giant rifle doesn't look very welcoming.

trans-unit.source: A species that is made of stone is something new to us.
trans-unit.target: A species that is made of stone is something new to us.

trans-unit.source: I am choosing to take that as a compliment.
trans-unit.target: I am choosing to take that as a compliment.

trans-unit.source: That weapon you hold is impressive.
trans-unit.target: That weapon you hold is impressive.

trans-unit.source: We deny ever stealing all the Nemandic gems from your sacred shrines.
trans-unit.target: We deny ever stealing all the Nemandic gems from your sacred shrines.

trans-unit.source: There may be some common ground we can find.
trans-unit.target: There may be some common ground we can find.

trans-unit.source: We are different from the others.
trans-unit.target: We are different from the others.

trans-unit.source: We remember the sentient trees of your world when they were saplings.
trans-unit.target: We remember the sentient trees of your world when they were saplings.

trans-unit.source: That is not as heartwarming as you might have thought it sounded.
trans-unit.target: That is not as heartwarming as you might have thought it sounded.

trans-unit.source: We were made to be beyond biology.
trans-unit.target: We were made to be beyond biology.

trans-unit.source: Our profits are what improves the wellbeing of the the universe.
trans-unit.target: Our profits are what improves the wellbeing of the the universe.

trans-unit.source: Prove yourselves worthy of our attention, and we can maintain a positive relationship.
trans-unit.target: Prove yourselves worthy of our attention, and we can maintain a positive relationship.

trans-unit.source: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.
trans-unit.target: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.

trans-unit.source: I'll make it a point to be nicer the next time you violate my privacy.
trans-unit.target: I'll make it a point to be nicer the next time you violate my privacy.

trans-unit.source: Your kind is no good to us without fleshy bits.
trans-unit.target: Your kind is no good to us without fleshy bits.

trans-unit.source: Ha! No remorse over such a violation? Lovely.
trans-unit.target: Ha! No remorse over such a violation? Lovely.

trans-unit.source: I don't need to read minds to tell you're not as special as you think.
trans-unit.target: I don't need to read minds to tell you're not as special as you think.

trans-unit.source: Telepathy? Your kind is curiously blessed.
trans-unit.target: Telepathy? Your kind is curiously blessed.

trans-unit.source: Why are you making intense eye contact?
trans-unit.target: Why are you making intense eye contact?

trans-unit.source: Not even your powerful mind can find all the answers.
trans-unit.target: Not even your powerful mind can find all the answers.

trans-unit.source: You know this? Oh, I understand -telepathy.
trans-unit.target: You know this? Oh, I understand -telepathy.

trans-unit.source: We'd never deal in bad faith.
trans-unit.target: We'd never deal in bad faith.

trans-unit.source: I'll take your advice into consideration.
trans-unit.target: I'll take your advice into consideration.

trans-unit.source: They are all that is worth thinking about.
trans-unit.target: They are all that is worth thinking about.

trans-unit.source: Pleasant to cross paths, as always.
trans-unit.target: Pleasant to cross paths, as always.

trans-unit.source: Your naivety and cleverness are constantly at odds. You continue to surprise me.
trans-unit.target: Your naivety and cleverness are constantly at odds. You continue to surprise me.

trans-unit.source: Keep to your section of space, and we'll consider forgiving your ilk.
trans-unit.target: Keep to your section of space, and we'll consider forgiving your ilk.

trans-unit.source: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.
trans-unit.target: We strive to extend kindness to all we meet.

trans-unit.source: There's much we can learn from our differences.
trans-unit.target: There's much we can learn from our differences.

trans-unit.source: Did they go extinct from hunger? You seem far too nutrient-deficient to make good hosts.
trans-unit.target: Did they go extinct from hunger? You seem far too nutrient-deficient to make good hosts.

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful there is much to share about our sectors.
trans-unit.target: We are hopeful there is much to share about our sectors.

trans-unit.source: I've no time for this righteous naivety.
trans-unit.target: I've no time for this righteous naivety.

trans-unit.source: A stable alliance between us may go a long way for all.
trans-unit.target: A stable alliance between us may go a long way for all.

trans-unit.source: You look like you'd make poor slaves.
trans-unit.target: You look like you'd make poor slaves.

trans-unit.source: Help us find that which was stolen and we can be allies.
trans-unit.target: Help us find that which was stolen and we can be allies.

trans-unit.source: Skepticism and healthy debate are the bedrock of faith.
trans-unit.target: Skepticism and healthy debate are the bedrock of faith.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to your business.
trans-unit.target: We look forward to your business.

trans-unit.source: Maybe our differences can complement each other.
trans-unit.target: Maybe our differences can complement each other.

trans-unit.source: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.
trans-unit.target: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.

trans-unit.source: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.
trans-unit.target: The sincerity I detect in your mind is rare.

trans-unit.source: Fake smile and nod as if you understand, then proceed to close the Incoming Message.
trans-unit.target: Fake smile and nod as if you understand, then proceed to close the Incoming Message.

trans-unit.source: Space is big. Probably big enough for both of us.
trans-unit.target: Space is big. Probably big enough for both of us.

trans-unit.source: Do not get in our way.
trans-unit.target: Do not get in our way.

trans-unit.source: We are skeptical about ever becoming friendly.
trans-unit.target: We are skeptical about ever becoming friendly.

trans-unit.source: Your claims are irrelevant to us.
trans-unit.target: Your claims are irrelevant to us.

trans-unit.source: We always enjoy talking to hairless apes.
trans-unit.target: We always enjoy talking to hairless apes.

trans-unit.source: Be careful or you may find yourself stepped on.
trans-unit.target: Be careful or you may find yourself stepped on.

trans-unit.source: We're going to murder you last.
trans-unit.target: We're going to murder you last.

trans-unit.source: Let's be honest, we're probably going to be foes.
trans-unit.target: Let's be honest, we're probably going to be foes.

trans-unit.source: We may look gentle on the outside, but don't mistake that for weakness.
trans-unit.target: We may look gentle on the outside, but don't mistake that for weakness.

trans-unit.source: I am pretty sure your grandfather was my chair.
trans-unit.target: I am pretty sure your grandfather was my chair.

trans-unit.source: There is no future for you.
trans-unit.target: There is no future for you.

trans-unit.source: We are the beings who will eventually use your bodies as hosts for our young.
trans-unit.target: We are the beings who will eventually use your bodies as hosts for our young.

trans-unit.source: It is doubtful our civilizations will ever reunite.
trans-unit.target: It is doubtful our civilizations will ever reunite.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to have met you.
trans-unit.target: We are glad to have met you.

trans-unit.source: We are very cute if you ignore the bones and gore.
trans-unit.target: We are very cute if you ignore the bones and gore.

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in you or your so-called civilization.
trans-unit.target: We have no interest in you or your so-called civilization.

trans-unit.source: Our past friendships do not affect our future.
trans-unit.target: Our past friendships do not affect our future.

trans-unit.source: We should work together. We have much in common.
trans-unit.target: We should work together. We have much in common.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: Do not get in our way, human.
trans-unit.target: Do not get in our way, human.

trans-unit.source: I still have hope we can work together.
trans-unit.target: I still have hope we can work together.

trans-unit.source: We will bring everyone of your kind, except you, into The Way.
trans-unit.target: We will bring everyone of your kind, except you, into The Way.

trans-unit.source: It appears we have common interests.
trans-unit.target: It appears we have common interests.

trans-unit.source: Please note for the future that these weird ones can read your mind.
trans-unit.target: Please note for the future that these weird ones can read your mind.

trans-unit.source: Our time is better spent communicating with others.
trans-unit.target: Our time is better spent communicating with others.

trans-unit.source: You can't lay eggs in us. Well, you probably could but don't.
trans-unit.target: You can't lay eggs in us. Well, you probably could but don't.

trans-unit.source: We had a species like yours on our planet. They're dead now.
trans-unit.target: We had a species like yours on our planet. They're dead now.

trans-unit.source: We literally eat your kind for breakfast.
trans-unit.target: We literally eat your kind for breakfast.

trans-unit.source: The ramblings of talking bugs amuses us.
trans-unit.target: The ramblings of talking bugs amuses us.

trans-unit.source: Your eggs will become our fuel.
trans-unit.target: Your eggs will become our fuel.

trans-unit.source: We have dealt with far worse than you.
trans-unit.target: We have dealt with far worse than you.

trans-unit.source: We will not hesitate to turn any species that threatens us to glass.
trans-unit.target: We will not hesitate to turn any species that threatens us to glass.

trans-unit.source: No, but you resemble monsters we've survived before.
trans-unit.target: No, but you resemble monsters we've survived before.

trans-unit.source: We exterminated a species that looked similar to you long ago.
trans-unit.target: We exterminated a species that looked similar to you long ago.

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful attempts at insults mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your pitiful attempts at insults mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: We didn't forget the Precursors. They were before our time.
trans-unit.target: We didn't forget the Precursors. They were before our time.

trans-unit.source: Hopefully we can find something that will serve your kind.
trans-unit.target: Hopefully we can find something that will serve your kind.

trans-unit.source: We are not interested in abetting your advantage.
trans-unit.target: We are not interested in abetting your advantage.

trans-unit.source: The stars are many. How can you assume to have explored them all?
trans-unit.target: The stars are many. How can you assume to have explored them all?

trans-unit.source: Only time will tell if you are delicious or not.
trans-unit.target: Only time will tell if you are delicious or not.

trans-unit.source: We will keep your species alive on farms.
trans-unit.target: We will keep your species alive on farms.

trans-unit.source: Things that look harmless rarely are.
trans-unit.target: Things that look harmless rarely are.

trans-unit.source: I wonder how difficult it will be to remove your fur.
trans-unit.target: I wonder how difficult it will be to remove your fur.

trans-unit.source: We will convert you into a more useful biomechanical paste.
trans-unit.target: We will convert you into a more useful biomechanical paste.

trans-unit.source: Are we to blame that your species tastes so good?
trans-unit.target: Are we to blame that your species tastes so good?

trans-unit.source: Were you larger, I'd consider that a threat.
trans-unit.target: Were you larger, I'd consider that a threat.

trans-unit.source: You will find that we are made of stern stuff.
trans-unit.target: You will find that we are made of stern stuff.

trans-unit.source: Soft flesh on a hard skeleton is such an ineffective design.
trans-unit.target: Soft flesh on a hard skeleton is such an ineffective design.

trans-unit.source: We will uplift your machines to gain mastery over you.
trans-unit.target: We will uplift your machines to gain mastery over you.

trans-unit.source: We have little in common with a criminal empire.
trans-unit.target: We have little in common with a criminal empire.

trans-unit.source: We prioritize our protection; remember that hair-crowned.
trans-unit.target: We prioritize our protection; remember that hair-crowned.

trans-unit.source: Careful yourself -we've survived where others conflagrated.
trans-unit.target: Careful yourself -we've survived where others conflagrated.

trans-unit.source: There are things much worse than Dread Lords in this universe.
trans-unit.target: There are things much worse than Dread Lords in this universe.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: We remember you selling a stargate that would allow you to invade our homeworld.
trans-unit.target: We remember you selling a stargate that would allow you to invade our homeworld.

trans-unit.source: We hope for peace. But we will also crush you if necessary.
trans-unit.target: We hope for peace. But we will also crush you if necessary.

trans-unit.source: If anyone ever needed a good blasting, it's you.
trans-unit.target: If anyone ever needed a good blasting, it's you.

trans-unit.source: We have very large and pointy teeth.
trans-unit.target: We have very large and pointy teeth.

trans-unit.source: We do not require you to understand us. Only obey.
trans-unit.target: We do not require you to understand us. Only obey.

trans-unit.source: We will have our vengeance yet.
trans-unit.target: We will have our vengeance yet.

trans-unit.source: Remember that we still have agents. They simply perform a more lethal kind of business.
trans-unit.target: Remember that we still have agents. They simply perform a more lethal kind of business.

trans-unit.source: A culture of war is one designed to disintegrate.
trans-unit.target: A culture of war is one designed to disintegrate.

trans-unit.source: Prophecy or crude manipulation you mean.
trans-unit.target: Prophecy or crude manipulation you mean.

trans-unit.source: Our actions involve laying eggs inside of you.
trans-unit.target: Our actions involve laying eggs inside of you.

trans-unit.source: We know enough about you to be wary of your claims of wanting peace.
trans-unit.target: We know enough about you to be wary of your claims of wanting peace.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: We are happy to try and work with anyone.
trans-unit.target: We are happy to try and work with anyone.

trans-unit.source: If there is a relation, we're the perfected form.
trans-unit.target: If there is a relation, we're the perfected form.

trans-unit.source: You look like something out of a nightmare.
trans-unit.target: You look like something out of a nightmare.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We know what you did to the Iconians. You will find us a difficult foe if it comes to that.
trans-unit.target: We know what you did to the Iconians. You will find us a difficult foe if it comes to that.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We will take back what is ours.
trans-unit.target: We will take back what is ours.

trans-unit.source: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.
trans-unit.target: We have little experience with synthetic life forms.

trans-unit.source: We bring joy and happiness through our products. Something you obviously don't understand.
trans-unit.target: We bring joy and happiness through our products. Something you obviously don't understand.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to discuss who makes the better battery?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to discuss who makes the better battery?

trans-unit.source: Your freedom or slavery remains to be seen.
trans-unit.target: Your freedom or slavery remains to be seen.

trans-unit.source: Ah, Torians. I have a dozen of you frozen for the New Argon feast.
trans-unit.target: Ah, Torians. I have a dozen of you frozen for the New Argon feast.

trans-unit.source: Your only value is your ability to populate quickly.
trans-unit.target: Your only value is your ability to populate quickly.

trans-unit.source: We suffered from the loss supply of your species.
trans-unit.target: We suffered from the loss supply of your species.

trans-unit.source: We lost many to other species as well. We will go to any lengths to protect ourselves.
trans-unit.target: We lost many to other species as well. We will go to any lengths to protect ourselves.

trans-unit.source: You actually look like what I had for dinner yesterday.
trans-unit.target: You actually look like what I had for dinner yesterday.

trans-unit.source: We are definitely the stuff of nightmares.
trans-unit.target: We are definitely the stuff of nightmares.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: I don't suppose you sell your children as a food commodity.
trans-unit.target: I don't suppose you sell your children as a food commodity.

trans-unit.source: Every story has two sides, if not more.
trans-unit.target: Every story has two sides, if not more.

trans-unit.source: Eyes are high in fats that our young like.
trans-unit.target: Eyes are high in fats that our young like.

trans-unit.source: You should just leave us alone.
trans-unit.target: You should just leave us alone.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: Those who claim to be pure of heart are the biggest consumers of our less savory products.
trans-unit.target: Those who claim to be pure of heart are the biggest consumers of our less savory products.

trans-unit.source: We find it hard to accept that which establishes division.
trans-unit.target: We find it hard to accept that which establishes division.

trans-unit.source: You do not want to know what we know.
trans-unit.target: You do not want to know what we know.

trans-unit.source: Are you leaving out the part that those eyes were evil robot eyes you created?
trans-unit.target: Are you leaving out the part that those eyes were evil robot eyes you created?

trans-unit.source: I will have your skull in my trophy case soon enough.
trans-unit.target: I will have your skull in my trophy case soon enough.

trans-unit.source: Empty words from a dying species.
trans-unit.target: Empty words from a dying species.

trans-unit.source: We equally support natural and unnatural selection.
trans-unit.target: We equally support natural and unnatural selection.

trans-unit.source: Trusting dead gods is folly; there's always more they've hidden.
trans-unit.target: Trusting dead gods is folly; there's always more they've hidden.

trans-unit.source: We mean no harm if that is the answer you hope to tease of us.
trans-unit.target: We mean no harm if that is the answer you hope to tease of us.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: You may find you wished we never met.
trans-unit.target: You may find you wished we never met.

trans-unit.source: Your villainous actions led to your exile. Own it.
trans-unit.target: Your villainous actions led to your exile. Own it.

trans-unit.source: You are a doomed relic of a dead past.
trans-unit.target: You are a doomed relic of a dead past.

trans-unit.source: You were exiled because you lost your war of aggression. Our world was stolen. We are not the same.
trans-unit.target: You were exiled because you lost your war of aggression. Our world was stolen. We are not the same.

trans-unit.source: We miss having you as one of our agents.
trans-unit.target: We miss having you as one of our agents.

trans-unit.source: You may find us harder to deceive than you think.
trans-unit.target: You may find us harder to deceive than you think.

trans-unit.source: No good comes from clinging to the dark.
trans-unit.target: No good comes from clinging to the dark.

trans-unit.source: Eyes are high in fats that our young like. We are going to get along well.
trans-unit.target: Eyes are high in fats that our young like. We are going to get along well.

trans-unit.source: Your greed won't save you from what is to come.
trans-unit.target: Your greed won't save you from what is to come.

trans-unit.source: We trade only when we can't take by force.
trans-unit.target: We trade only when we can't take by force.

trans-unit.source: We've survived without your market for eons; we'll be fine without it.
trans-unit.target: We've survived without your market for eons; we'll be fine without it.

trans-unit.source: We are both quite different from the others.
trans-unit.target: We are both quite different from the others.

trans-unit.source: I hope we can work together giant gun guy.
trans-unit.target: I hope we can work together giant gun guy.

trans-unit.source: I doubt your species has a future at all.
trans-unit.target: I doubt your species has a future at all.

trans-unit.source: Let's see who looks frail when your porous bodies are turned to glass.
trans-unit.target: Let's see who looks frail when your porous bodies are turned to glass.

trans-unit.source: Your bodies are useless to us. Be gone.
trans-unit.target: Your bodies are useless to us. Be gone.

trans-unit.source: Only time will tell whether you will survive what is coming.
trans-unit.target: Only time will tell whether you will survive what is coming.

trans-unit.source: The 5 other species on our world thought the same thing.
trans-unit.target: The 5 other species on our world thought the same thing.

trans-unit.source: Your words mean nothing to us.
trans-unit.target: Your words mean nothing to us.

trans-unit.source: We are hopeful we can still do business together.
trans-unit.target: We are hopeful we can still do business together.

trans-unit.source: So this is what the Individualism of the Terrans brings -fractured groups.
trans-unit.target: So this is what the Individualism of the Terrans brings -fractured groups.

trans-unit.source: We help those willing to help others.
trans-unit.target: We help those willing to help others.

trans-unit.source: I'll save my breath and let my mind do the talking.
trans-unit.target: I'll save my breath and let my mind do the talking.

trans-unit.source: We are a threat, even to hostless bodies like yours.
trans-unit.target: We are a threat, even to hostless bodies like yours.

trans-unit.source: You can keep your assumptions to yourself.
trans-unit.target: You can keep your assumptions to yourself.

trans-unit.source: Read away. I've no shame in our rejection of pitiful laws made by the weak.
trans-unit.target: Read away. I've no shame in our rejection of pitiful laws made by the weak.

trans-unit.source: Disgusting! Get in my head again, and I'll rip yours off.
trans-unit.target: Disgusting! Get in my head again, and I'll rip yours off.

trans-unit.source: You'll fit right in with the species of our sector. They refuse to recognize our elevated development as well.
trans-unit.target: You'll fit right in with the species of our sector. They refuse to recognize our elevated development as well.

trans-unit.source: To find The Way, one must first find humility. We'll be here when you do.
trans-unit.target: To find The Way, one must first find humility. We'll be here when you do.

trans-unit.source: I have little patience for your arrogance.
trans-unit.target: I have little patience for your arrogance.

trans-unit.source: We'll need to trust each other to deal fairly.
trans-unit.target: We'll need to trust each other to deal fairly.

trans-unit.source: Warn me next time. I'll give you something more interesting to read.
trans-unit.target: Warn me next time. I'll give you something more interesting to read.

trans-unit.source: Are you reading my mind? I'll turn you into a mirror!
trans-unit.target: Are you reading my mind? I'll turn you into a mirror!

trans-unit.source: I hope we can keep this civil.
trans-unit.target: I hope we can keep this civil.

trans-unit.source: We've survived worse and uglier than you. Reach out when you're done with your tantrum.
trans-unit.target: We've survived worse and uglier than you. Reach out when you're done with your tantrum.

trans-unit.source: Take a breath before you pass out. You're far from a threat to us.
trans-unit.target: Take a breath before you pass out. You're far from a threat to us.

trans-unit.source: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.
trans-unit.target: Just remember, as you develop, who elevated you first.

trans-unit.source: It's only a matter of time before we can wipe the universe of your blight.
trans-unit.target: It's only a matter of time before we can wipe the universe of your blight.

trans-unit.source: You'd do well to keep us in your nightmares.
trans-unit.target: You'd do well to keep us in your nightmares.

trans-unit.source: There may be something to share if you survive contact with this sector.
trans-unit.target: There may be something to share if you survive contact with this sector.

trans-unit.source: Your quick demise will be helpful enough.
trans-unit.target: Your quick demise will be helpful enough.

trans-unit.source: True neutrality is rare; we are skeptical of your intentions.
trans-unit.target: True neutrality is rare; we are skeptical of your intentions.

trans-unit.source: We'll give you plenty of reasons to embrace brutality.
trans-unit.target: We'll give you plenty of reasons to embrace brutality.

trans-unit.source: We'll share when you have proven yourself beyond suspicion.
trans-unit.target: We'll share when you have proven yourself beyond suspicion.

trans-unit.source: It's ill-advised to work with those who question The Way.
trans-unit.target: It's ill-advised to work with those who question The Way.

trans-unit.source: Business has no use for friendship.
trans-unit.target: Business has no use for friendship.

trans-unit.source: Hm. That remains to be seen.
trans-unit.target: Hm. That remains to be seen.

trans-unit.source: Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.
trans-unit.target: Try not to let your fear scream so loudly in your head.

trans-unit.source: Keep your hope; it's a mistake.
trans-unit.target: Keep your hope; it's a mistake.

trans-unit.source: Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu![BR][BR](We've just conquered one of your planets.)
trans-unit.target: Ibbu nesha sigu, wehu![BR][BR](We've just conquered one of your planets.)

trans-unit.source: We've just conquered one of your planets.
trans-unit.target: We've just conquered one of your planets.

trans-unit.source: We have liberated one of your worlds.
trans-unit.target: We have liberated one of your worlds.

trans-unit.source: Our eggs have found a new home on one of your former worlds.
trans-unit.target: Our eggs have found a new home on one of your former worlds.

trans-unit.source: One of your worlds is now under our control.
trans-unit.target: One of your worlds is now under our control.

trans-unit.source: We have freed one of your worlds from your ickiness.
trans-unit.target: We have freed one of your worlds from your ickiness.

trans-unit.source: We have set free the people of one of your planets.
trans-unit.target: We have set free the people of one of your planets.

trans-unit.source: We shall dine well tonight on the fools of your planet that we just conquered.
trans-unit.target: We shall dine well tonight on the fools of your planet that we just conquered.

trans-unit.source: We can now share our wisdom with the people of the world we just took from you.
trans-unit.target: We can now share our wisdom with the people of the world we just took from you.

trans-unit.source: We have assimilated one of your worlds. Rejoice.
trans-unit.target: We have assimilated one of your worlds. Rejoice.

trans-unit.source: We can now share The Way with the people of your world that we just conquered.
trans-unit.target: We can now share The Way with the people of your world that we just conquered.

trans-unit.source: Our investment in our military has paid off. Your planet now belongs to us.
trans-unit.target: Our investment in our military has paid off. Your planet now belongs to us.

trans-unit.source: We hope you understand that this planet is now under our care.
trans-unit.target: We hope you understand that this planet is now under our care.

trans-unit.source: The people of the world we just took can now know true safety.
trans-unit.target: The people of the world we just took can now know true safety.

trans-unit.source: Talotic yopitu mul nesin, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Talotic yopitu mul nesin, {PLAYERFACTION:2}.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: The time for peace is over, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Prepare for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: The time for peace is over, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Prepare for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It is time for your worlds to be commanded by a superior civilization. Prepare to die.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: It is time for your worlds to be commanded by a superior civilization. Prepare to die.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: A shame it had to end like this. There was so much promise in our relationship. Well. Know that although we do not like starting wars, we are very good at finishing them.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: A shame it had to end like this. There was so much promise in our relationship. Well. Know that although we do not like starting wars, we are very good at finishing them.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: War has come for you, preymeat. Soon you will be filled with sacs of eggs. Mentally prepare yourself.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: War has come for you, preymeat. Soon you will be filled with sacs of eggs. Mentally prepare yourself.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We do not run anymore, alien. We confront our enemies now. The time has come for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We do not run anymore, alien. We confront our enemies now. The time has come for war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We will not be dominated by anyone, ever again. We will become the dominators. And we will start with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We will not be dominated by anyone, ever again. We will become the dominators. And we will start with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We are going to destroy you now, alien. Annihilate you utterly. Don't ask why. We don't have to explain our reasons to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We are going to destroy you now, alien. Annihilate you utterly. Don't ask why. We don't have to explain our reasons to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We have seen more war than most. We do not seek it, but when it is necessary, we do not shy from it. And we do not shy from war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We have seen more war than most. We do not seek it, but when it is necessary, we do not shy from it. And we do not shy from war with you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We grow tired of the wet, slapping sounds you make when you speak, alien. When we eventually conquer you, we'll have to do something about that.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We grow tired of the wet, slapping sounds you make when you speak, alien. When we eventually conquer you, we'll have to do something about that.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We declare war. An abhorrent thought for our people, but we're prepared to make an exception for the likes of an abhorrent people like you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We declare war. An abhorrent thought for our people, but we're prepared to make an exception for the likes of an abhorrent people like you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You call it war, we call it sanitizing the universe of vermin. Either way, your time has ended.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: You call it war, we call it sanitizing the universe of vermin. Either way, your time has ended.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It is time for you to stop terrorizing us. We are done having war brought to us. Now we bring it to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: It is time for you to stop terrorizing us. We are done having war brought to us. Now we bring it to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: This galaxy is filled with predators. We never thought we would become one ourselves. But we must, if we can rid the universe of your presence.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: This galaxy is filled with predators. We never thought we would become one ourselves. But we must, if we can rid the universe of your presence.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Ideally, the way of the Krynn is spread by conversation and quiet reflection. Only in the rarest of circumstances must we resort to force. We do so now, alien.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Ideally, the way of the Krynn is spread by conversation and quiet reflection. Only in the rarest of circumstances must we resort to force. We do so now, alien.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We are not instinctive warmongers. But we have seen enough of it for you to be very worried about what will happen when we bring war to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We are not instinctive warmongers. But we have seen enough of it for you to be very worried about what will happen when we bring war to you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We don't like being seen taking direct action ourselves. That we do so now, to destroy you, should tell you just how much you deserve it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We don't like being seen taking direct action ourselves. That we do so now, to destroy you, should tell you just how much you deserve it.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: It's normally better to profit from other civilization's wars, rather than your own. But we are willing to take a small loss if it means your death.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: It's normally better to profit from other civilization's wars, rather than your own. But we are willing to take a small loss if it means your death.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Your actions have brought us to the steaming caldera of war, surface dweller. And now we take us in. The Onyx Hive will be the end of you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Your actions have brought us to the steaming caldera of war, surface dweller. And now we take us in. The Onyx Hive will be the end of you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We will simply wait for your attack, we made that mistake already.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We will simply wait for your attack, we made that mistake already.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You have soiled the galaxy long enough, animal. We will stop you. All right-thinking plants will thank us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: You have soiled the galaxy long enough, animal. We will stop you. All right-thinking plants will thank us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Despite our best efforts, the time has come to admit diplomacy is no longer of service between us. We do not revel in this decision, but we must do our part to promote security -even if it means going to war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Despite our best efforts, the time has come to admit diplomacy is no longer of service between us. We do not revel in this decision, but we must do our part to promote security -even if it means going to war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: I have peered into the mind of you and your people. No longer can I ignore your inclinations against the interest of the Luxar Dominion.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: I have peered into the mind of you and your people. No longer can I ignore your inclinations against the interest of the Luxar Dominion.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We cannot leave the galaxy at the mercy of space insects. Prepare to be exterminated[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We cannot leave the galaxy at the mercy of space insects. Prepare to be exterminated[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Deep down, you always knew that it would end with us at war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Deep down, you always knew that it would end with us at war.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We have concluded that there is no future that ends well with a race of malevolent machines running loose. Therefore, we have decided to unplug you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We have concluded that there is no future that ends well with a race of malevolent machines running loose. Therefore, we have decided to unplug you.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We know what you truly are, human. You are, as your kind likes to say, a wolf in sheep's clothing.[BR][BR]Your facade of diplomacy and trade does not fool us. We will grind your bones into a fine powder.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We know what you truly are, human. You are, as your kind likes to say, a wolf in sheep's clothing.[BR][BR]Your facade of diplomacy and trade does not fool us. We will grind your bones into a fine powder.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We wish there was another way but no other civilization has the wisdom to guide the galaxy as we do.[BR][BR]We will show you mercy once you utterly capitulate to us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We wish there was another way but no other civilization has the wisdom to guide the galaxy as we do.[BR][BR]We will show you mercy once you utterly capitulate to us.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: Your kind is an abomination. There was never a scenario where we would allow machines to thrive in our galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: Your kind is an abomination. There was never a scenario where we would allow machines to thrive in our galaxy.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: I hardly believe the day has come to declare war with your faction. Follow the light into the beam of our lasers and the explosions of our rockets.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: I hardly believe the day has come to declare war with your faction. Follow the light into the beam of our lasers and the explosions of our rockets.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You've benefited from our developments long enough.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: You've benefited from our developments long enough.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: The time has come to cleanse the galaxy of your filth. This war will not repeat our previous conflict; we come prepared.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: The time has come to cleanse the galaxy of your filth. This war will not repeat our previous conflict; we come prepared.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We've given every chance and benefit of the doubt. We can no longer ignore your threat to life across the universe. I'm sorry, it's come time to burn.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We've given every chance and benefit of the doubt. We can no longer ignore your threat to life across the universe. I'm sorry, it's come time to burn.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We've observed enough and have concluded that you are a tumor. Life is to be valued, but you only survive as others perish.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We've observed enough and have concluded that you are a tumor. Life is to be valued, but you only survive as others perish.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: We declare war. We don't need you anymore.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We declare war. We don't need you anymore.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You will regret this. Whatever you are.
trans-unit.target: You will regret this. Whatever you are.

trans-unit.source: You have made a fatal mistake.
trans-unit.target: You have made a fatal mistake.

trans-unit.source: We shall make you suffer for this.
trans-unit.target: We shall make you suffer for this.

trans-unit.source: You will be our slaves when this is over.
trans-unit.target: You will be our slaves when this is over.

trans-unit.source: We are going to crush you.
trans-unit.target: We are going to crush you.

trans-unit.source: Your worlds will soon be our property
trans-unit.target: Your worlds will soon be our property

trans-unit.source: You will not be spared the full extent of our armament and telepathic tactics.
trans-unit.target: You will not be spared the full extent of our armament and telepathic tactics.

trans-unit.source: We will convert your organs into fuel.
trans-unit.target: We will convert your organs into fuel.

trans-unit.source: The only good bug is a dead bug.
trans-unit.target: The only good bug is a dead bug.

trans-unit.source: This will be the last error your kind makes.
trans-unit.target: This will be the last error your kind makes.

trans-unit.source: It's amazing something so cute can be soo foolish.
trans-unit.target: It's amazing something so cute can be soo foolish.

trans-unit.source: You have made a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: You have made a fatal error.

trans-unit.source: You are a dying race. We will speed your passing.
trans-unit.target: You are a dying race. We will speed your passing.

trans-unit.source: You will soon discover that we are very, very good at war.
trans-unit.target: You will soon discover that we are very, very good at war.

trans-unit.source: I think you overestimate your wisdom and military might.
trans-unit.target: I think you overestimate your wisdom and military might.

trans-unit.source: When we are done with you there will be no trace of your species left.
trans-unit.target: When we are done with you there will be no trace of your species left.

trans-unit.source: We will use what's left of you for spare parts.
trans-unit.target: We will use what's left of you for spare parts.

trans-unit.source: You will find we are even worse than the Drengin.
trans-unit.target: You will find we are even worse than the Drengin.

trans-unit.source: We will boil you for dinner.
trans-unit.target: We will boil you for dinner.

trans-unit.source: You will lose more than your homeworld when we're done.
trans-unit.target: You will lose more than your homeworld when we're done.

trans-unit.source: It appears we must slay another beast.
trans-unit.target: It appears we must slay another beast.

trans-unit.source: We will loot what's left of your worlds.
trans-unit.target: We will loot what's left of your worlds.

trans-unit.source: You will be kindling for a bonfire when we are done with you.
trans-unit.target: You will be kindling for a bonfire when we are done with you.

trans-unit.source: Today, we find this choice immensely regrettable. Tomorrow so will you.
trans-unit.target: Today, we find this choice immensely regrettable. Tomorrow so will you.

trans-unit.source: I see you've learned to be ungrateful. So be it.
trans-unit.target: I see you've learned to be ungrateful. So be it.

trans-unit.source: This conflict will not end until we purge you from the universe.
trans-unit.target: This conflict will not end until we purge you from the universe.

trans-unit.source: You will rue the day you declared war.
trans-unit.target: You will rue the day you declared war.

trans-unit.source: I wish we had found a way to do business together.
trans-unit.target: I wish we had found a way to do business together.

trans-unit.source: We knew we should never have expanded.
trans-unit.target: We knew we should never have expanded.

trans-unit.source: I've seen your mind. I'm not surprised.
trans-unit.target: I've seen your mind. I'm not surprised.

trans-unit.source: Your opinions are irrelevant. Soon, your entire species will be irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: Your opinions are irrelevant. Soon, your entire species will be irrelevant.

trans-unit.source: You will wish you had never been hatched.
trans-unit.target: You will wish you had never been hatched.

trans-unit.source: We are saddened that you have chosen death.
trans-unit.target: We are saddened that you have chosen death.

trans-unit.source: You have made a terrible mistake.
trans-unit.target: You have made a terrible mistake.

trans-unit.source: You have fallen away from logic.
trans-unit.target: You have fallen away from logic.

trans-unit.source: So the slave now wants to be a slaver?
trans-unit.target: So the slave now wants to be a slaver?

trans-unit.source: So the true nature of The Way is revealed.
trans-unit.target: So the true nature of The Way is revealed.

trans-unit.source: We had hoped we could work together. Alas.
trans-unit.target: We had hoped we could work together. Alas.

trans-unit.source: This will not be a profitable venture for you.
trans-unit.target: This will not be a profitable venture for you.

trans-unit.source: How much effort you put into paranoid warmongering is a pity.
trans-unit.target: How much effort you put into paranoid warmongering is a pity.

trans-unit.source: And you think you're informed enough to make that decision?
trans-unit.target: And you think you're informed enough to make that decision?

trans-unit.source: I had such higher hopes for your kind.
trans-unit.target: I had such higher hopes for your kind.

trans-unit.source: We knew this day would come. Already I mourn the dead this conflict will leave in its wake.
trans-unit.target: We knew this day would come. Already I mourn the dead this conflict will leave in its wake.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, this war has not necessarily gone in the direction we had intended. We would have peace.
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, this war has not necessarily gone in the direction we had intended. We would have peace.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we are weary of the conflict and the toll it has taken. Could we not establish tranquility between us?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we are weary of the conflict and the toll it has taken. Could we not establish tranquility between us?

trans-unit.source: We, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, propose to cease hostilities. What say you to a peaceful resolution?
trans-unit.target: We, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, propose to cease hostilities. What say you to a peaceful resolution?

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1} extends an olive branch to you. Will you grasp it and bring an end to this conflict?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1} extends an olive branch to you. Will you grasp it and bring an end to this conflict?

trans-unit.source: Enough, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we have seen enough destruction. Shall we put an end to this and live in harmony?
trans-unit.target: Enough, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we have seen enough destruction. Shall we put an end to this and live in harmony?

trans-unit.source: This war, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has drained us. We wish for serenity. Will you not consider a peaceful coexistence?
trans-unit.target: This war, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has drained us. We wish for serenity. Will you not consider a peaceful coexistence?

trans-unit.source: Could we, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, not strive for peace rather than continue this endless battle?
trans-unit.target: Could we, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, not strive for peace rather than continue this endless battle?

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we seek to resolve our differences. Shall we walk the path of peace together?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, we seek to resolve our differences. Shall we walk the path of peace together?

trans-unit.source: War has grown old, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We extend our hand in peace. Will you accept?
trans-unit.target: War has grown old, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. We extend our hand in peace. Will you accept?

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, let us end the cycle of violence. What do you say to a pact of peace?
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:2}, let us end the cycle of violence. What do you say to a pact of peace?

trans-unit.source: We have battled long and hard, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, we offer a proposition of peace. Will you embrace it?
trans-unit.target: We have battled long and hard, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Now, we offer a proposition of peace. Will you embrace it?

trans-unit.source: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Let us make the peace last for as long as it can.
trans-unit.target: Let us make the peace last for as long as it can.

trans-unit.source: It is far too late now.
trans-unit.target: It is far too late now.

trans-unit.source: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Gahr flab tou metina![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We had hoped to avoid this needless bloodshed. But you have brought this on yourself.
trans-unit.target: We had hoped to avoid this needless bloodshed. But you have brought this on yourself.

trans-unit.source: Your rejection saddens us, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The ensuing conflict is a product of your decision.
trans-unit.target: Your rejection saddens us, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The ensuing conflict is a product of your decision.

trans-unit.source: We offered peace, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you chose war. The consequences are yours to bear.
trans-unit.target: We offered peace, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you chose war. The consequences are yours to bear.

trans-unit.source: Your refusal means more destruction, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Remember, it was your choice.
trans-unit.target: Your refusal means more destruction, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. Remember, it was your choice.

trans-unit.source: We find your decision unfortunate, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The bloodshed that follows is on your hands.
trans-unit.target: We find your decision unfortunate, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. The bloodshed that follows is on your hands.

trans-unit.source: Despite our plea for peace, you persist, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You have chosen this path of conflict.
trans-unit.target: Despite our plea for peace, you persist, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You have chosen this path of conflict.

trans-unit.source: We had wished for tranquility, but your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has determined a different course.
trans-unit.target: We had wished for tranquility, but your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, has determined a different course.

trans-unit.source: You have made your choice, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, and regrettably, it is one that leads to further strife.
trans-unit.target: You have made your choice, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, and regrettably, it is one that leads to further strife.

trans-unit.source: Your refusal invites more chaos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This burden of choice is yours.
trans-unit.target: Your refusal invites more chaos, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. This burden of choice is yours.

trans-unit.source: We presented a chance for harmony, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you have opted for discord. The repercussions are now yours to deal with.
trans-unit.target: We presented a chance for harmony, {PLAYERFACTION:2}, but you have opted for discord. The repercussions are now yours to deal with.

trans-unit.source: Our hopes for peace are dashed by your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You must shoulder the responsibility for the coming conflict.
trans-unit.target: Our hopes for peace are dashed by your decision, {PLAYERFACTION:2}. You must shoulder the responsibility for the coming conflict.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: What brings you this way, alien?
trans-unit.target: What brings you this way, alien?

trans-unit.source: Be quick, our time is valuble.
trans-unit.target: Be quick, our time is valuble.

trans-unit.source: Since you already have ships trespassing through our sphere of influence, I guess it makes sense you'd drop by in person.
trans-unit.target: Since you already have ships trespassing through our sphere of influence, I guess it makes sense you'd drop by in person.

trans-unit.source: Now that that whole war business is behind us, let's have a more productive relationship, yes?
trans-unit.target: Now that that whole war business is behind us, let's have a more productive relationship, yes?

trans-unit.source: Humanity is united under one banner. We hope that others, including you, might join us.
trans-unit.target: Humanity is united under one banner. We hope that others, including you, might join us.

trans-unit.source: Hmm. A being not filled with sacs of our eggs. What a shallow existence for you.
trans-unit.target: Hmm. A being not filled with sacs of our eggs. What a shallow existence for you.

trans-unit.source: This war has not gone as we had hoped.
trans-unit.target: This war has not gone as we had hoped.

trans-unit.source: The time for groveling has arrived.
trans-unit.target: The time for groveling has arrived.

trans-unit.source: I look forward to your pleading.
trans-unit.target: I look forward to your pleading.

trans-unit.source: Greetings, lifeforms! What friendly, peer to peer conversation can we have today?
trans-unit.target: Greetings, lifeforms! What friendly, peer to peer conversation can we have today?

trans-unit.source: Hello, other one. What can you do for us today?
trans-unit.target: Hello, other one. What can you do for us today?

trans-unit.source: Pleasure to see you again, small alien. What can the Arcean Republic do for you?
trans-unit.target: Pleasure to see you again, small alien. What can the Arcean Republic do for you?

trans-unit.source: Don't waste my time with meaningless words, scum. Make this worth my time.
trans-unit.target: Don't waste my time with meaningless words, scum. Make this worth my time.

trans-unit.source: Did you know we pursue art and science with equal devotion? One is meaningless without the other.
trans-unit.target: Did you know we pursue art and science with equal devotion? One is meaningless without the other.

trans-unit.source: Were you aware that every Altarian can recite the cosmic laws by the age of three? Such basic knowledge, but we understand it might be advanced for others.
trans-unit.target: Were you aware that every Altarian can recite the cosmic laws by the age of three? Such basic knowledge, but we understand it might be advanced for others.

trans-unit.source: Did you know Altarians meditate in binary? It's a simple exercise in cognitive superiority. We're sure you'll get there one day.
trans-unit.target: Did you know Altarians meditate in binary? It's a simple exercise in cognitive superiority. We're sure you'll get there one day.

trans-unit.source: Are you aware that our society has eliminated the concept of waste? Every object serves a multitude of purposes in its lifecycle. Such elegance might seem alien to you, quite understandably.
trans-unit.target: Are you aware that our society has eliminated the concept of waste? Every object serves a multitude of purposes in its lifecycle. Such elegance might seem alien to you, quite understandably.

trans-unit.source: Do you know that we Altarians have solved all known paradoxes of quantum physics over our afternoon tea? It is a delightful diversion. Do try it some time, if you can.
trans-unit.target: Do you know that we Altarians have solved all known paradoxes of quantum physics over our afternoon tea? It is a delightful diversion. Do try it some time, if you can.

trans-unit.source: Did you know that every single Altarian composes an original symphony as a rite of passage? We understand if this concept is foreign to you. After all, harmonizing the cosmic vibrations is no trivial task for the uninitiated.
trans-unit.target: Did you know that every single Altarian composes an original symphony as a rite of passage? We understand if this concept is foreign to you. After all, harmonizing the cosmic vibrations is no trivial task for the uninitiated.

trans-unit.source: Oh, good. Exchanging words with a biological lifeform. Flap whatever it is you use to communicate.
trans-unit.target: Oh, good. Exchanging words with a biological lifeform. Flap whatever it is you use to communicate.

trans-unit.source: We trust you no more than we have to.
trans-unit.target: We trust you no more than we have to.

trans-unit.source: We have not had good experiences with aliens. We hope it will be different with you.
trans-unit.target: We have not had good experiences with aliens. We hope it will be different with you.

trans-unit.source: Have you found the way of the Krynn yet, alien? No? Ahh. Alas.
trans-unit.target: Have you found the way of the Krynn yet, alien? No? Ahh. Alas.

trans-unit.source: You are young in our eyes. Perhaps not so innocent though. So. What do you have to say for yourself?
trans-unit.target: You are young in our eyes. Perhaps not so innocent though. So. What do you have to say for yourself?

trans-unit.source: We have seen betrayal before. We can smell it coming. Don't think you can trick us, alien.
trans-unit.target: We have seen betrayal before. We can smell it coming. Don't think you can trick us, alien.

trans-unit.source: We hoard nothing and delight in bringing the goods of the universe to those who desire them. For a reasonable profit, of course.
trans-unit.target: We hoard nothing and delight in bringing the goods of the universe to those who desire them. For a reasonable profit, of course.

trans-unit.source: How do you live like you do? Do you not understand the beautiful simplicity of life in an asteroid? It is glorious.
trans-unit.target: How do you live like you do? Do you not understand the beautiful simplicity of life in an asteroid? It is glorious.

trans-unit.source: It is always a delight for us when we can speak with an animal. You are so clever, sometimes.
trans-unit.target: It is always a delight for us when we can speak with an animal. You are so clever, sometimes.

trans-unit.source: You will find us loyal friends, and dangerous enemies. Be careful which you choose.
trans-unit.target: You will find us loyal friends, and dangerous enemies. Be careful which you choose.

trans-unit.source: Your communication is a pleasant surprise. What can we discuss today?
trans-unit.target: Your communication is a pleasant surprise. What can we discuss today?

trans-unit.source: We are always hungry. Therefore, speak quickly unless you want to become food.
trans-unit.target: We are always hungry. Therefore, speak quickly unless you want to become food.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to see the humans. What would you like to talk about today?
trans-unit.target: We are pleased to see the humans. What would you like to talk about today?

trans-unit.source: Hello human. What sorts of trouble can we get into together today?
trans-unit.target: Hello human. What sorts of trouble can we get into together today?

trans-unit.source: What can we do for you today, human?
trans-unit.target: What can we do for you today, human?

trans-unit.source: It is a pleasure to see you, little human.
trans-unit.target: It is a pleasure to see you, little human.

trans-unit.source: Ah the fleshling humans. It is good to see you up on your hind legs.
trans-unit.target: Ah the fleshling humans. It is good to see you up on your hind legs.

trans-unit.source: Are you ready to become our food again? You made such excellent slaves
trans-unit.target: Are you ready to become our food again? You made such excellent slaves

trans-unit.source: We always enjoy talking to the humans. It is like looking into a mirror.
trans-unit.target: We always enjoy talking to the humans. It is like looking into a mirror.

trans-unit.source: What is it you want today, fleshling?
trans-unit.target: What is it you want today, fleshling?

trans-unit.source: What do the land loving humans want today?
trans-unit.target: What do the land loving humans want today?

trans-unit.source: No matter what we discuss today, know that this will not end until we have annihilated all of your kind.
trans-unit.target: No matter what we discuss today, know that this will not end until we have annihilated all of your kind.

trans-unit.source: Have you left our homeworld yet, robot?
trans-unit.target: Have you left our homeworld yet, robot?

trans-unit.source: Unless you are willing to give us Elemental, we will never truly have peace.
trans-unit.target: Unless you are willing to give us Elemental, we will never truly have peace.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Leave us, we are preoccupied at the moment.
trans-unit.target: Leave us, we are preoccupied at the moment.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! It is by your hand that 'The Everwar' began. And now you wish to talk? Begone.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}! It is by your hand that 'The Everwar' began. And now you wish to talk? Begone.

trans-unit.source: Ah, {LEADERNAME:2} - the great bringer of 'The Everwar'. Did you light the Flames of War only to come asking for forgiveness? It is far too late for such things.
trans-unit.target: Ah, {LEADERNAME:2} - the great bringer of 'The Everwar'. Did you light the Flames of War only to come asking for forgiveness? It is far too late for such things.

trans-unit.source: Your word lights the galaxy ablaze with War and now you come asking to trade? Are all {PLAYERFACTION:2} this foolish?
trans-unit.target: Your word lights the galaxy ablaze with War and now you come asking to trade? Are all {PLAYERFACTION:2} this foolish?

trans-unit.source: The Everwar' rages by your hand, {LEADERNAME:2}. May it cause your demise.
trans-unit.target: The Everwar' rages by your hand, {LEADERNAME:2}. May it cause your demise.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! The galaxy has turned against you. You will not survive the tide. Begone.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}! The galaxy has turned against you. You will not survive the tide. Begone.

trans-unit.source: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Enoreset rir nenat ho carasal usecares ge tek seg sanas, {LEADERNAME:2}. Rihec {PLAYERRACE:2}'s toj ya dieno ces nomi?![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}! The Apocalypse has begun. The time for diplomacy is past.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}! The Apocalypse has begun. The time for diplomacy is past.

trans-unit.source: Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, lesasa uwetadel ise neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1} babenat adonecie si podotic![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Erasuto ki nakeduc menurit! {LEADERNAME:2}, lesasa uwetadel ise neforal {PLAYERFACTION:1} babenat adonecie si podotic![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We are grateful to your mercy.
trans-unit.target: We are grateful to your mercy.

trans-unit.source: You may now live on your knees.
trans-unit.target: You may now live on your knees.

trans-unit.source: You are fortunate we are feeling merciful today.
trans-unit.target: You are fortunate we are feeling merciful today.

trans-unit.source: You are very persuasive, let's trade.
trans-unit.target: You are very persuasive, let's trade.

trans-unit.source: We accept your offer, but we will remember this next time.
trans-unit.target: We accept your offer, but we will remember this next time.

trans-unit.source: Agreed, let us bind the terms in stone.
trans-unit.target: Agreed, let us bind the terms in stone.

trans-unit.source: This trade proposition may serve to further our dominance.
trans-unit.target: This trade proposition may serve to further our dominance.

trans-unit.source: There is high probability of mutual benefit.
trans-unit.target: There is high probability of mutual benefit.

trans-unit.source: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis iwiwilam oce geme {LEADERNAME:2}. Oti rini pe roni oten latuher ver inegur![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: {PLAYERFACTION:1}, obis iwiwilam oce geme {LEADERNAME:2}. Oti rini pe roni oten latuher ver inegur![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: I wouldn't give you pebbles for this.
trans-unit.target: I wouldn't give you pebbles for this.

trans-unit.source: This is the kind of offer I'd expect one of my slaves to make.
trans-unit.target: This is the kind of offer I'd expect one of my slaves to make.

trans-unit.source: Your offer is what I would expect of an organic.
trans-unit.target: Your offer is what I would expect of an organic.

trans-unit.source: Do you take us for fools? Try harder.
trans-unit.target: Do you take us for fools? Try harder.

trans-unit.source: A pitiful excuse for an offer.
trans-unit.target: A pitiful excuse for an offer.

trans-unit.source: If you were not across that screen I would kill you where you stand for this offer.
trans-unit.target: If you were not across that screen I would kill you where you stand for this offer.

trans-unit.source: I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.
trans-unit.target: I should gut you for suggesting this proposal.

trans-unit.source: This offer does not fit our parameters.
trans-unit.target: This offer does not fit our parameters.

trans-unit.source: You think yourself clever for this offer?
trans-unit.target: You think yourself clever for this offer?

trans-unit.source: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: I'm glad we could come to an agreement.
trans-unit.target: I'm glad we could come to an agreement.

trans-unit.source: May this prosperous exchange unite our civilizations.
trans-unit.target: May this prosperous exchange unite our civilizations.

trans-unit.source: A crystalized agreement brings me content.
trans-unit.target: A crystalized agreement brings me content.

trans-unit.source: Perfect, I'll have my servants see to it.
trans-unit.target: Perfect, I'll have my servants see to it.

trans-unit.source: Post-execution analysis indicates a successful exchange.
trans-unit.target: Post-execution analysis indicates a successful exchange.

trans-unit.source: I am glad we could come to an agreement.
trans-unit.target: I am glad we could come to an agreement.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased with this result.
trans-unit.target: We are pleased with this result.

trans-unit.source: We toast you for a successful negotiation.
trans-unit.target: We toast you for a successful negotiation.

trans-unit.source: This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.
trans-unit.target: This is barely acceptable but I have no more time to waste.

trans-unit.source: This will work for us. For now.
trans-unit.target: This will work for us. For now.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased we could come to an arrangement.
trans-unit.target: We are pleased we could come to an arrangement.

trans-unit.source: We compute that this is an equitable agreement.
trans-unit.target: We compute that this is an equitable agreement.

trans-unit.source: It is a pleasure doing business with you.
trans-unit.target: It is a pleasure doing business with you.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for offering us your better deal.
trans-unit.target: Thank you for offering us your better deal.

trans-unit.source: La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec?[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: La yol ele po. Sa riras tenalac hasec?[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: What do you have in mind?
trans-unit.target: What do you have in mind?

trans-unit.source: I am interested in seeing your proposal.
trans-unit.target: I am interested in seeing your proposal.

trans-unit.source: Let us see what you propose.
trans-unit.target: Let us see what you propose.

trans-unit.source: Our mineral forms remain steadfast and patient, we anticipate the presentation of your trade proposition.
