trans-unit.target: Our mineral forms remain steadfast and patient, we anticipate the presentation of your trade proposition.

trans-unit.source: Present an offer worthy of our superior civilization.
trans-unit.target: Present an offer worthy of our superior civilization.

trans-unit.source: Currently awaiting input of trade proposition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Currently awaiting input of trade proposition parameters.

trans-unit.source: We are interested in trading this with you.
trans-unit.target: We are interested in trading this with you.

trans-unit.source: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
trans-unit.target: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.

trans-unit.source: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. We have an offer for you.
trans-unit.target: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. We have an offer for you.

trans-unit.source: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
trans-unit.target: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
trans-unit.target: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.

trans-unit.source: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
trans-unit.target: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
trans-unit.target: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?

trans-unit.source: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
trans-unit.target: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.

trans-unit.source: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
trans-unit.target: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?
trans-unit.target: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?

trans-unit.source: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.
trans-unit.target: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.

trans-unit.source: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, fleshling.
trans-unit.target: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, fleshling.

trans-unit.source: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.
trans-unit.target: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.

trans-unit.source: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.
trans-unit.target: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.

trans-unit.source: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?
trans-unit.target: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?

trans-unit.source: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.
trans-unit.target: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.

trans-unit.source: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.
trans-unit.target: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.

trans-unit.source: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.
trans-unit.target: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.

trans-unit.source: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.
trans-unit.target: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.
trans-unit.target: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.

trans-unit.source: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.
trans-unit.target: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.

trans-unit.source: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.
trans-unit.target: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.

trans-unit.source: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.
trans-unit.target: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.

trans-unit.source: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.
trans-unit.target: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.

trans-unit.source: Let this trade deepen our alliance and benefit us both.
trans-unit.target: Let this trade deepen our alliance and benefit us both.

trans-unit.source: We are looking to negotiate a deal.
trans-unit.target: We are looking to negotiate a deal.

trans-unit.source: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Inibero opilide bo somufat nunor pieta oril![BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We are interested in trading this with you.
trans-unit.target: We are interested in trading this with you.

trans-unit.source: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.
trans-unit.target: You have some things we want and we have some things we think you will like.

trans-unit.source: Take a look at this trade opportunity.
trans-unit.target: Take a look at this trade opportunity.

trans-unit.source: We are really excited to make this offer to you. Our gills are literally filled with delight. Or bacteria. It could definitely be bacteria now that I think of it.
trans-unit.target: We are really excited to make this offer to you. Our gills are literally filled with delight. Or bacteria. It could definitely be bacteria now that I think of it.

trans-unit.source: We're just bursting with anticipation! Or it's the pressure from being this deep. No, it's definitely anticipation!
trans-unit.target: We're just bursting with anticipation! Or it's the pressure from being this deep. No, it's definitely anticipation!

trans-unit.source: We offer you the pearls of our wisdom and trade, encased in oysters of friendship. Just don't ask where the oysters came from.
trans-unit.target: We offer you the pearls of our wisdom and trade, encased in oysters of friendship. Just don't ask where the oysters came from.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to our ocean of possibilities. We hope you don't mind if we dive right into negotiations. Or if we suddenly start singing. It's mating season, you see. You probably didn't need to know that.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to our ocean of possibilities. We hope you don't mind if we dive right into negotiations. Or if we suddenly start singing. It's mating season, you see. You probably didn't need to know that.

trans-unit.source: We're fresh out of the Drengin pain amplifiers and ready to negotiate a good deal. What do you think of this trade?
trans-unit.target: We're fresh out of the Drengin pain amplifiers and ready to negotiate a good deal. What do you think of this trade?

trans-unit.source: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. The Terrans have an offer for you.
trans-unit.target: Ahh. My delightful alien counterpart. The Terrans have an offer for you.

trans-unit.source: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.
trans-unit.target: We have a mutually beneficial offer for you, preymeat.

trans-unit.source: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.
trans-unit.target: Do you wish to share wisdom with us? We wish to share it with you.

trans-unit.source: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!
trans-unit.target: We have something that you want and you have something that we want. What a happy day!

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?
trans-unit.target: We have a trade offer for you, alien. It's extremely beneficial for us. Does anything more need to be said?

trans-unit.source: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.
trans-unit.target: Let us share with each other, as all prudent civilizations do.

trans-unit.source: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.
trans-unit.target: We normally take what we want from pathetic worms like you. But now here we are offering something in return. Surprising.

trans-unit.source: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?
trans-unit.target: Your pitiful existence has somehow drawn our attention. How intriguing. Let's talk trade, shall we?

trans-unit.source: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.
trans-unit.target: It amuses us to momentarily lower ourselves to your level. Consider this trade a rare act of mercy.

trans-unit.source: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, worm.
trans-unit.target: It's not often that we deign to barter with inferiors. You should consider this a high honor, worm.

trans-unit.source: We've momentarily grown tired of conquest. Let's play this quaint game of trade you seem so fond of.
trans-unit.target: We've momentarily grown tired of conquest. Let's play this quaint game of trade you seem so fond of.

trans-unit.source: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.
trans-unit.target: Feeling charitable today. We offer you trade, a chance to crawl from the mud. Grab it before we change our minds.

trans-unit.source: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.
trans-unit.target: We would like to share our great, Altarian wisdom with you. We require only a triviality in exchange.

trans-unit.source: Ascend the lowly stairs of your understanding through trade with us. We merely ask for a trinket in return, something you may manage to comprehend.
trans-unit.target: Ascend the lowly stairs of your understanding through trade with us. We merely ask for a trinket in return, something you may manage to comprehend.

trans-unit.source: Bask in the glory of our celestial wisdom in this trade. Surely even you can see the value in our divine offer, despite your obvious limitations.
trans-unit.target: Bask in the glory of our celestial wisdom in this trade. Surely even you can see the value in our divine offer, despite your obvious limitations.

trans-unit.source: The divine paths have crossed, hinting at an exchange between us. We request only the most basic of your goods, for anything complex might be beyond your grasp.
trans-unit.target: The divine paths have crossed, hinting at an exchange between us. We request only the most basic of your goods, for anything complex might be beyond your grasp.

trans-unit.source: Even in our infinite grandeur, we stoop to enlighten you through trade. You should be overwhelmed by gratitude, for such benevolence is rare in the cosmos.
trans-unit.target: Even in our infinite grandeur, we stoop to enlighten you through trade. You should be overwhelmed by gratitude, for such benevolence is rare in the cosmos.

trans-unit.source: We permit you a glimpse of our radiant wisdom. Accept our trade offer, for even the dullest of stones can catch a glimmer of light, wouldn't you agree?
trans-unit.target: We permit you a glimpse of our radiant wisdom. Accept our trade offer, for even the dullest of stones can catch a glimmer of light, wouldn't you agree?

trans-unit.source: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?
trans-unit.target: Perhaps we can interest you in an aesthetically pleasing ordering of 0's and 1's?

trans-unit.source: If you think this offer isn't a fair deal then you aren't seeing the big picture. We've already hacked your communications array and know that you think that we are some sort of primitive AI that can't assemble a good offer. I can assure you, this is a good deal. Take it.
trans-unit.target: If you think this offer isn't a fair deal then you aren't seeing the big picture. We've already hacked your communications array and know that you think that we are some sort of primitive AI that can't assemble a good offer. I can assure you, this is a good deal. Take it.

trans-unit.source: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.
trans-unit.target: Here is an exchange we propose, alien. It is a good one, fair and true.

trans-unit.source: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.
trans-unit.target: We are wary of others. Even of you. We request this trade under cautious terms.

trans-unit.source: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.
trans-unit.target: Even if you have not yet found the way of Krynn yourself, that does not mean we cannot share with each other.

trans-unit.source: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.
trans-unit.target: We have forgotten more than you will ever learn, alien. But we have not forgotten this wisdom we wish to trade with you now.

trans-unit.source: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.
trans-unit.target: We have a trade offer for you. It is simple and easy to understand on the surface. You should have no misgivings.

trans-unit.source: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.
trans-unit.target: We share nothing freely, but the terms we offer you today are mighty close.

trans-unit.source: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.
trans-unit.target: You have many interesting things we desire, unhived one. Let us trade for them.

trans-unit.source: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.
trans-unit.target: Remember, we can read your mind. Make sure to deal with us fairly.

trans-unit.source: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.
trans-unit.target: You are clever, for animals. We wish to do trade with you.

trans-unit.source: Here is what we had in mind: {TRADEGOOD:0}.
trans-unit.target: Here is what we had in mind: {TRADEGOOD:0}.

trans-unit.source: In addition we are including some other items for your consideration.
trans-unit.target: In addition we are including some other items for your consideration.

trans-unit.source: As you can see we have added other items to the mix.
trans-unit.target: As you can see we have added other items to the mix.

trans-unit.source: I don't know what you're saying, but it's probably hostile. Prepare for war!
trans-unit.target: I don't know what you're saying, but it's probably hostile. Prepare for war!

trans-unit.source: The time has come to destroy you.
trans-unit.target: The time has come to destroy you.

trans-unit.source: It is time for you to die.
trans-unit.target: It is time for you to die.

trans-unit.source: This war is tiring. I wish we could work past our differences... (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)
trans-unit.target: This war is tiring. I wish we could work past our differences... (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)

trans-unit.source: Very well, consider us at war.
trans-unit.target: Very well, consider us at war.

trans-unit.source: So be it. War it is.
trans-unit.target: So be it. War it is.

trans-unit.source: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]

trans-unit.source: We aren't interested in talking to you.
trans-unit.target: We aren't interested in talking to you.

trans-unit.source: We're not interested in hearing your groveling.
trans-unit.target: We're not interested in hearing your groveling.

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in hearing your cries for mercy.
trans-unit.target: We have no interest in hearing your cries for mercy.

trans-unit.source: I guess you don't feel like talking.
trans-unit.target: I guess you don't feel like talking.

trans-unit.source: Yeah, you heard me! Also, you sound dumb!
trans-unit.target: Yeah, you heard me! Also, you sound dumb!

trans-unit.source: Sorry, just kidding. You couldn't understand me... right?
trans-unit.target: Sorry, just kidding. You couldn't understand me... right?

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Our time is precious, but we are always interested in working with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} under the right circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Our time is precious, but we are always interested in working with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} under the right circumstances.

trans-unit.source: We are very busy but we always have time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
trans-unit.target: We are very busy but we always have time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.

trans-unit.source: We are very hungry. Very, very hungry. If you are wasting our time, you will need to compensate us with the only currency you have.
trans-unit.target: We are very hungry. Very, very hungry. If you are wasting our time, you will need to compensate us with the only currency you have.

trans-unit.source: We are busy exploring the universe but we can spare a little time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
trans-unit.target: We are busy exploring the universe but we can spare a little time for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.

trans-unit.source: Being this cute takes a lot of time but then again what's the point of being cute if you can't spend a little time talking to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.
trans-unit.target: Being this cute takes a lot of time but then again what's the point of being cute if you can't spend a little time talking to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}.

trans-unit.source: What more would you like to discuss with me?
trans-unit.target: What more would you like to discuss with me?

trans-unit.source: What can we do for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} today?
trans-unit.target: What can we do for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} today?

trans-unit.source: What additional topics would you like to talk about?
trans-unit.target: What additional topics would you like to talk about?

trans-unit.source: Are you ready to be saved now?
trans-unit.target: Are you ready to be saved now?

trans-unit.source: What else can there be to discuss?
trans-unit.target: What else can there be to discuss?

trans-unit.source: What other topic that might be profitable would you like to discuss?
trans-unit.target: What other topic that might be profitable would you like to discuss?

trans-unit.source: We have the patience of the great grove. But our patience isn't endless.
trans-unit.target: We have the patience of the great grove. But our patience isn't endless.

trans-unit.source: Sound is a crude form of communication, but it is all you have.
trans-unit.target: Sound is a crude form of communication, but it is all you have.

trans-unit.source: Is there more we can discuss today -be it for business or leisure?
trans-unit.target: Is there more we can discuss today -be it for business or leisure?

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We would like to publicly proclaim our never ending friendship for you.
trans-unit.target: We would like to publicly proclaim our never ending friendship for you.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Remove your ships from our territory immediately.
trans-unit.target: Remove your ships from our territory immediately.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: The cost of policing space is not trivial. We would like you to contribute to help cover our expenses.
trans-unit.target: The cost of policing space is not trivial. We would like you to contribute to help cover our expenses.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We require financial help. Please give it to us.
trans-unit.target: We require financial help. Please give it to us.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We would like to offer you financial aid, with the hope that it will strengthen our relationship.
trans-unit.target: We would like to offer you financial aid, with the hope that it will strengthen our relationship.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We accept your expression of friendship with the value it is worth.
trans-unit.target: We accept your expression of friendship with the value it is worth.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We hope our relationship will grow even closer in the future.
trans-unit.target: We hope our relationship will grow even closer in the future.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}, we are sorry that our ships have made you nervous. We will ask them to leave your territories immediately.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}, we are sorry that our ships have made you nervous. We will ask them to leave your territories immediately.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}, it is a very large galaxy. We cannot afford to waste time avoiding your territory because you are paranoid. Our ships will continue their missions; we suggest you do not get in their way.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}, it is a very large galaxy. We cannot afford to waste time avoiding your territory because you are paranoid. Our ships will continue their missions; we suggest you do not get in their way.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: They had better be careful, or you will find yourself with a smaller fleet.
trans-unit.target: They had better be careful, or you will find yourself with a smaller fleet.

trans-unit.source: We are willing to pay for security, for the time being. We have more important issues that require our attention. I do not recommend you push your luck any further.
trans-unit.target: We are willing to pay for security, for the time being. We have more important issues that require our attention. I do not recommend you push your luck any further.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: As long as you keep the credits coming, we will not have a problem.
trans-unit.target: As long as you keep the credits coming, we will not have a problem.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in paying you to leave us in peace. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} will not forget this attempted extortion. You will regret it if you continue to pester us.
trans-unit.target: We have no interest in paying you to leave us in peace. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} will not forget this attempted extortion. You will regret it if you continue to pester us.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: OK, but don't blame us if one of your ships should have an 'accident'.
trans-unit.target: OK, but don't blame us if one of your ships should have an 'accident'.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has been a friend to us in the past. We are willing to help you in your time of need.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has been a friend to us in the past. We are willing to help you in your time of need.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.
trans-unit.target: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.
trans-unit.target: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have struggled with technological progress recently, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you please share the knowledge of {TECHNAME:2} with us?
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have struggled with technological progress recently, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you please share the knowledge of {TECHNAME:2} with us?

trans-unit.source: We are great admirers of your technological capabilities. Would you be willing to share {TECHNAME:2} with us?
trans-unit.target: We are great admirers of your technological capabilities. Would you be willing to share {TECHNAME:2} with us?

trans-unit.source: No matter how much we torture our slaves, they cannot seem to grasp {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.
trans-unit.target: No matter how much we torture our slaves, they cannot seem to grasp {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.

trans-unit.source: The gods have not seen fit to give us the secret of {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.
trans-unit.target: The gods have not seen fit to give us the secret of {TECHNAME:2} technology, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would appreciate you sharing this technology with us.

trans-unit.source: We are always willing to help a friend.
trans-unit.target: We are always willing to help a friend.

trans-unit.source: Very well, we are glad to help.
trans-unit.target: Very well, we are glad to help.

trans-unit.source: We won't forget this. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: We won't forget this. Thank you.

trans-unit.source: This will help our people immensely.
trans-unit.target: This will help our people immensely.

trans-unit.source: Your willingness to share with us is truly appreciated.
trans-unit.target: Your willingness to share with us is truly appreciated.

trans-unit.source: This knowledge is too dangerous to share.
trans-unit.target: This knowledge is too dangerous to share.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are suffering an economic setback, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you be willing to give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help us?
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} are suffering an economic setback, {LEADERNAME:2}. Would you be willing to give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help us?

trans-unit.source: We are finding our treasury stretched thin due to recent internal... incidents. We would appreciate it if you could give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help fund this year's budget.
trans-unit.target: We are finding our treasury stretched thin due to recent internal... incidents. We would appreciate it if you could give us {AMOUNT:2} credits to help fund this year's budget.

trans-unit.source: The people of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} need money to help the war effort, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please support us with {AMOUNT:2} credits to help pay for it.
trans-unit.target: The people of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} need money to help the war effort, {LEADERNAME:2}. Please support us with {AMOUNT:2} credits to help pay for it.

trans-unit.source: I won't lie to you, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} really like money. A lot. We dream of it. We sleep with it. We...well, we do a lot of things with it. And we need more. A lot more. It would help our relations if you gave us {AMOUNT:2} credits.
trans-unit.target: I won't lie to you, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} really like money. A lot. We dream of it. We sleep with it. We...well, we do a lot of things with it. And we need more. A lot more. It would help our relations if you gave us {AMOUNT:2} credits.

trans-unit.source: Our ongoing research is expensive, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} is asking you for {AMOUNT:2} credits so that we can continue to invest in new technology. Doing so will benefit our relationship.
trans-unit.target: Our ongoing research is expensive, {LEADERNAME:2}. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} is asking you for {AMOUNT:2} credits so that we can continue to invest in new technology. Doing so will benefit our relationship.

trans-unit.source: We are wary of outsiders, {LEADERNAME:2}. However, the people of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} find themselves struggling a little bit. If you could provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits it would strengthen our bond.
trans-unit.target: We are wary of outsiders, {LEADERNAME:2}. However, the people of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} find themselves struggling a little bit. If you could provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits it would strengthen our bond.

trans-unit.source: We are always willing to help. Well, not always but at least this time.
trans-unit.target: We are always willing to help. Well, not always but at least this time.

trans-unit.source: We will not forget this act of generosity.
trans-unit.target: We will not forget this act of generosity.

trans-unit.source: We don't have enough money to help you.
trans-unit.target: We don't have enough money to help you.

trans-unit.source: We have enough of that resource.
trans-unit.target: We have enough of that resource.

trans-unit.source: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. This freedom may be temporary. There is a threat as long as the Xeloxi occupy this part of the galaxy. The Xeloxi must be pushed from the sector, and any planet they claim retaken.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations
trans-unit.target: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. This freedom may be temporary. There is a threat as long as the Xeloxi occupy this part of the galaxy. The Xeloxi must be pushed from the sector, and any planet they claim retaken.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations

trans-unit.source: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. In addition, the Xeloxi have already been pushed from this part of the galaxy, providing additional security to these fledgling civilizations.[BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations
trans-unit.target: The Minor Civilizations of the sector now know relief. While under Alliance protection, they are free of the Xeloxi's oppression. In addition, the Xeloxi have already been pushed from this part of the galaxy, providing additional security to these fledgling civilizations.[BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Protect 3 Minor Civilizations

trans-unit.source: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations of this sector may not feel relief yet. They remain unprotected and may still suffer from the Xeloxi influence. To stabilize this section of the galaxy, the Minor Civilizations should be brought under the Alliance's Zone of Control.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi
trans-unit.target: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations of this sector may not feel relief yet. They remain unprotected and may still suffer from the Xeloxi influence. To stabilize this section of the galaxy, the Minor Civilizations should be brought under the Alliance's Zone of Control.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi

trans-unit.source: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations can know true peace, at least for a moment. They are now under Alliance protection, and the Xeloxi threat has been sent far away.BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi
trans-unit.target: The Xeloxi have been defeated! They are driven from this part of the galaxy. Great work.[BR][BR]The Minor Civilizations can know true peace, at least for a moment. They are now under Alliance protection, and the Xeloxi threat has been sent far away.BR][BR]Congratulations on fulfilling your duties.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Defeat the Xeloxi

trans-unit.source: Abort![BR][BR]Something must have gone wrong. One of the Minor Civilizations has been destroyed. Things have escalated too far. The lives that remain can not be risked.[BR][BR]This mission is being counted as failed, and the Alliance is pulling all resources from the sector.[BR][BR]Failed Objective: Ensure All Minor Factions Survive
trans-unit.target: Abort![BR][BR]Something must have gone wrong. One of the Minor Civilizations has been destroyed. Things have escalated too far. The lives that remain can not be risked.[BR][BR]This mission is being counted as failed, and the Alliance is pulling all resources from the sector.[BR][BR]Failed Objective: Ensure All Minor Factions Survive

trans-unit.source: If there is a way to save you we will find it.
trans-unit.target: If there is a way to save you we will find it.

trans-unit.source: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Our experiments have gone awry. It has control now. There is nothing to be done but die. [BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:2} must be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Our experiments have gone awry. It has control now. There is nothing to be done but die. [BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:2} must be destroyed.

trans-unit.source: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. We have come here from an alternate future where the {PLAYERFACTION:2} have destroyed the universe itself.[BR][BR]You must be stopped. Prepare yourselves for destruction.
trans-unit.target: We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. We have come here from an alternate future where the {PLAYERFACTION:2} have destroyed the universe itself.[BR][BR]You must be stopped. Prepare yourselves for destruction.

trans-unit.source: You should go back to your tree, rodent.
trans-unit.target: You should go back to your tree, rodent.

trans-unit.source: Your doom is at hand. We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. [BR][BR]We will rid the galaxy of all sub-Sciuridae filth.
trans-unit.target: Your doom is at hand. We are the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. [BR][BR]We will rid the galaxy of all sub-Sciuridae filth.

trans-unit.source: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](A scrambled tranmission arrives)[/COLOR][BR][BR]The galaxy thought we were dead. You will soon learn how wrong they were. Prepare for death.
trans-unit.target: [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](A scrambled tranmission arrives)[/COLOR][BR][BR]The galaxy thought we were dead. You will soon learn how wrong they were. Prepare for death.

trans-unit.source: Tallas orda cullan bana. (You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Tallas orda cullan bana. (You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: As you probably suspect, we will soon be laying our eggs inside your flesh.
trans-unit.target: As you probably suspect, we will soon be laying our eggs inside your flesh.

trans-unit.source: We have heard you refer to the Arnor and Dread Lords as the Precursors. We were the first to discover the subspace streams that connect different parts of the galaxy together.[BR][BR]What is not commonly known is that we didn't invent any sort of technology for this per se. They are not an invention but rather a discovery.[BR][BR]The subspace streams are, in fact, a natural phenomenon of the universe. For all we know, there are streams that reach other galaxies entirely.
trans-unit.target: We have heard you refer to the Arnor and Dread Lords as the Precursors. We were the first to discover the subspace streams that connect different parts of the galaxy together.[BR][BR]What is not commonly known is that we didn't invent any sort of technology for this per se. They are not an invention but rather a discovery.[BR][BR]The subspace streams are, in fact, a natural phenomenon of the universe. For all we know, there are streams that reach other galaxies entirely.

trans-unit.source: There are far stranger oddities in the universe than the subspace streams. For instance, there are dimensional gates that travel between different universes entirely.[BR][BR]We once encountered a species from another universe known as the Arilou who came from a universe with its own storied history.
trans-unit.target: There are far stranger oddities in the universe than the subspace streams. For instance, there are dimensional gates that travel between different universes entirely.[BR][BR]We once encountered a species from another universe known as the Arilou who came from a universe with its own storied history.

trans-unit.source: Long after the Precursors disappeared we were satisfied with simply exploring the universe to find the next great wonder.[BR][BR]Unfortunately, there are far worse things in the universe than the species you refer to as the Dread Lords. [BR][BR]The ancient creators, known as the Mithrilar, had experimented on many types of creations before they made the Precursors and not all of those things are gone and some, I am afraid to say, are now awakened.
trans-unit.target: Long after the Precursors disappeared we were satisfied with simply exploring the universe to find the next great wonder.[BR][BR]Unfortunately, there are far worse things in the universe than the species you refer to as the Dread Lords. [BR][BR]The ancient creators, known as the Mithrilar, had experimented on many types of creations before they made the Precursors and not all of those things are gone and some, I am afraid to say, are now awakened.

trans-unit.source: Long ago, on our world, there were five other sentient species. I suppose you could call them 'Sapient' but who am I to play games with semantics. In any case, we were the only ones to survive.
trans-unit.target: Long ago, on our world, there were five other sentient species. I suppose you could call them 'Sapient' but who am I to play games with semantics. In any case, we were the only ones to survive.

trans-unit.source: For us, self-interest is the highest form of morality. You can know, with absolute certainty, that we will be your most loyal friend if it is in our self-interest for you to survive.[BR][BR]Of course, conversely, if it is in our self-interest for you to die, you can be equally assured that you will die.
trans-unit.target: For us, self-interest is the highest form of morality. You can know, with absolute certainty, that we will be your most loyal friend if it is in our self-interest for you to survive.[BR][BR]Of course, conversely, if it is in our self-interest for you to die, you can be equally assured that you will die.

trans-unit.source: It has been lost to history but it was our civilization that invented the stargates. [BR][BR]Over two hundred thousand years we invested trillions into the construction of a vast network of stargates.[BR][BR]The stargates allowed ships to travel Hyperspace level 2 between any two of them. This cut down the travel time of a ship traveling 10 lightyears down to only a little over 3 years.[BR][BR]Of course, the proliferation of the Hyperdrive technology allowed individual ships to travel much faster making our efforts obsolete. But for tens of thousands of years, this part of the galaxy was ours.
trans-unit.target: It has been lost to history but it was our civilization that invented the stargates. [BR][BR]Over two hundred thousand years we invested trillions into the construction of a vast network of stargates.[BR][BR]The stargates allowed ships to travel Hyperspace level 2 between any two of them. This cut down the travel time of a ship traveling 10 lightyears down to only a little over 3 years.[BR][BR]Of course, the proliferation of the Hyperdrive technology allowed individual ships to travel much faster making our efforts obsolete. But for tens of thousands of years, this part of the galaxy was ours.

trans-unit.source: The other civilizations have not come to the realization that the universe is not only finite but only a small fraction will ever be reachable. [BR][BR]Make no mistake, this galaxy is all we will ever reach.
trans-unit.target: The other civilizations have not come to the realization that the universe is not only finite but only a small fraction will ever be reachable. [BR][BR]Make no mistake, this galaxy is all we will ever reach.

trans-unit.source: Our world was called 'Elemental' by the Precursors during their height. [BR][BR]The first off-world proxy war between the two Precursor factions that we called the Dred'nir and Elas'nir was fought on the surface of our planet long before the other species of the galaxy even evolved into their modern form. Yes, that even includes the humans.
trans-unit.target: Our world was called 'Elemental' by the Precursors during their height. [BR][BR]The first off-world proxy war between the two Precursor factions that we called the Dred'nir and Elas'nir was fought on the surface of our planet long before the other species of the galaxy even evolved into their modern form. Yes, that even includes the humans.

trans-unit.source: We may not exterminate your kind in the immediate future. But eventually there will be a reckoning.[BR][BR]We have made the calculations. The great void sometimes called Bootes void is simply the result of billions of years of Dyson sphere construction hiding the light of countless galaxies. The civilization at the center of that void has already had their singularity.
trans-unit.target: We may not exterminate your kind in the immediate future. But eventually there will be a reckoning.[BR][BR]We have made the calculations. The great void sometimes called Bootes void is simply the result of billions of years of Dyson sphere construction hiding the light of countless galaxies. The civilization at the center of that void has already had their singularity.

trans-unit.source: Our civilization was once a peaceful, preindustrial, aquatic paradise. Then the Drengin came.
trans-unit.target: Our civilization was once a peaceful, preindustrial, aquatic paradise. Then the Drengin came.

trans-unit.source: We were aware of space travel for centuries. How could we help but not know when raiders were perpetually coming down from the heavens and stealing our offspring?[BR][BR]It was fortunate for us when one of their ships failed to escape the surface of our planet and we learned their secrets.
trans-unit.target: We were aware of space travel for centuries. How could we help but not know when raiders were perpetually coming down from the heavens and stealing our offspring?[BR][BR]It was fortunate for us when one of their ships failed to escape the surface of our planet and we learned their secrets.

trans-unit.source: We do not seek to destroy the Yor simply because they stole our home world. [BR][BR]Contrary to some reports, we did not actually create the Yor. The Precursors ordered us to make them, but the actual spark of life that the Yor have did not come from us.
trans-unit.target: We do not seek to destroy the Yor simply because they stole our home world. [BR][BR]Contrary to some reports, we did not actually create the Yor. The Precursors ordered us to make them, but the actual spark of life that the Yor have did not come from us.

trans-unit.source: In a galaxy with such varied species, it is easy to simply stereotype different civilizations based on their most obvious traits. [BR][BR]We are treated like we are greedy. But this isn't true. Our ideology is opportunity. When we trade, we are creating a better universe for our customers as well as for ourselves.
trans-unit.target: In a galaxy with such varied species, it is easy to simply stereotype different civilizations based on their most obvious traits. [BR][BR]We are treated like we are greedy. But this isn't true. Our ideology is opportunity. When we trade, we are creating a better universe for our customers as well as for ourselves.

trans-unit.source: We are not explorers by choice but by necessity.[BR][BR]There is something actively absorbing the life force from all worlds. That is why you find so many dead planets. These worlds weren't always dead.
trans-unit.target: We are not explorers by choice but by necessity.[BR][BR]There is something actively absorbing the life force from all worlds. That is why you find so many dead planets. These worlds weren't always dead.

trans-unit.source: We look forward to rejoining Earth. But while Earth was trapped behind a Precursor shield for years, our fleet was trapped in a pocket universe of the Precursors making.[BR][BR]We saw things in that pocket universe that we cannot unsee. It wasn't just the Orb of Draginol, the so-called Bane weapon, that came out of that pocket universe with us.
trans-unit.target: We look forward to rejoining Earth. But while Earth was trapped behind a Precursor shield for years, our fleet was trapped in a pocket universe of the Precursors making.[BR][BR]We saw things in that pocket universe that we cannot unsee. It wasn't just the Orb of Draginol, the so-called Bane weapon, that came out of that pocket universe with us.

trans-unit.source: A well informed galaxy is a peaceful galaxy. If you want to know things about others, seek us out.
trans-unit.target: A well informed galaxy is a peaceful galaxy. If you want to know things about others, seek us out.

trans-unit.source: While we are certainly physically capable of physically crushing any other species, we do our best to avoid actual direct physical violence.[BR][BR]Our kind can only reproduce on our original home world that is now lost to us. While we are long lived, we are not immortal nor are indestructible.
trans-unit.target: While we are certainly physically capable of physically crushing any other species, we do our best to avoid actual direct physical violence.[BR][BR]Our kind can only reproduce on our original home world that is now lost to us. While we are long lived, we are not immortal nor are indestructible.

trans-unit.source: There is a misunderstanding that THE WAY is a religion based on faith. It is not. [BR][BR]We are a collection of species that have had direct, physical contact with a being of such immense glory, whose plan for the universe is so sublime, that we feel obligated to bring others into this holy cause.
trans-unit.target: There is a misunderstanding that THE WAY is a religion based on faith. It is not. [BR][BR]We are a collection of species that have had direct, physical contact with a being of such immense glory, whose plan for the universe is so sublime, that we feel obligated to bring others into this holy cause.

trans-unit.source: The time is coming where we civilizations with the same philosophy must unite together to destroy those who would stand against us.
trans-unit.target: The time is coming where we civilizations with the same philosophy must unite together to destroy those who would stand against us.

trans-unit.source: Soon, {LEADERNAME:2}, the galaxy will unite one way or the other.
trans-unit.target: Soon, {LEADERNAME:2}, the galaxy will unite one way or the other.

trans-unit.source: We are pleased with the ideological path you have chosen thus far. Benevolence is the path of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: We are pleased with the ideological path you have chosen thus far. Benevolence is the path of the righteous.

trans-unit.source: Resisting the temptation of evil is not always easy. But it will help us all build a better galaxy.
trans-unit.target: Resisting the temptation of evil is not always easy. But it will help us all build a better galaxy.

trans-unit.source: The universe is dark enough without adding to it, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are pleased with the path you have taken so far.
trans-unit.target: The universe is dark enough without adding to it, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are pleased with the path you have taken so far.

trans-unit.source: You impress us, {LEADERNAME:2}. Your understanding that the weak are fodder for the strong has won you respect with us.
trans-unit.target: You impress us, {LEADERNAME:2}. Your understanding that the weak are fodder for the strong has won you respect with us.

trans-unit.source: Is it kinder to allow the weak to continue to suffer a state of existence? Or to end their pain by exterminating them? Based on your actions, {LEADERNAME:2}, it would seem you agree with us. The weak must be exterminated.
trans-unit.target: Is it kinder to allow the weak to continue to suffer a state of existence? Or to end their pain by exterminating them? Based on your actions, {LEADERNAME:2}, it would seem you agree with us. The weak must be exterminated.

trans-unit.source: What, exactly, are you supposed to be? Some sort of rock-based worm species?
trans-unit.target: What, exactly, are you supposed to be? Some sort of rock-based worm species?

trans-unit.source: It is hard to believe that a silicon-based life form naturally evolved. Are you sure you are natural?
trans-unit.target: It is hard to believe that a silicon-based life form naturally evolved. Are you sure you are natural?

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} should have stayed in the sewers of their home world, {LEADERNAME:2}. There is very little water in space.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} should have stayed in the sewers of their home world, {LEADERNAME:2}. There is very little water in space.

trans-unit.source: The vacuum of space is no place for the likes of you, {LEADERNAME:2} . You should return to the oceans of your home world.
trans-unit.target: The vacuum of space is no place for the likes of you, {LEADERNAME:2} . You should return to the oceans of your home world.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} and {PLAYERFACTION:1} will crush our mutual enemies together! We look forward to torturing them and their pets!
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} and {PLAYERFACTION:1} will crush our mutual enemies together! We look forward to torturing them and their pets!

trans-unit.source: It is a shame we find ourselves in a time of galactic war. But with you fighting our mutual enemy we believe victory is certain.
trans-unit.target: It is a shame we find ourselves in a time of galactic war. But with you fighting our mutual enemy we believe victory is certain.

trans-unit.source: Be careful who you trade with, {LEADERNAME:2}. Our people have no tolerance for those who affiliate themselves with evil.
trans-unit.target: Be careful who you trade with, {LEADERNAME:2}. Our people have no tolerance for those who affiliate themselves with evil.

trans-unit.source: The advantage you may have gained by declaring war early will cost you far more in good will, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: The advantage you may have gained by declaring war early will cost you far more in good will, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: Your civilization makes me ill. The evil and immorality that you are spreading across the universe makes us dream for your demise.
trans-unit.target: Your civilization makes me ill. The evil and immorality that you are spreading across the universe makes us dream for your demise.

trans-unit.source: Your evil civilization will eventually suffer the fate of all civilizations that lack of a moral code.
trans-unit.target: Your evil civilization will eventually suffer the fate of all civilizations that lack of a moral code.

trans-unit.source: It saddens us that your civilization continues to exist. We look forward to the day your species goes extinct from the universe.
trans-unit.target: It saddens us that your civilization continues to exist. We look forward to the day your species goes extinct from the universe.

trans-unit.source: Your civilization has chosen a poor ethical route. We can only hope that in time, you suffer the fate of all evil empires.
trans-unit.target: Your civilization has chosen a poor ethical route. We can only hope that in time, you suffer the fate of all evil empires.

trans-unit.source: You think your power is impressive? Your civilization thrives only because it has always taken the quick and easy path.
trans-unit.target: You think your power is impressive? Your civilization thrives only because it has always taken the quick and easy path.

trans-unit.source: Despite your power, we continue to see you as inferiors due to your moral choices.
trans-unit.target: Despite your power, we continue to see you as inferiors due to your moral choices.

trans-unit.source: The corruption within the heart of your civilization has given you a temporary benefit in power. But eventually, your civilization will crumble and we will be there to laugh.
trans-unit.target: The corruption within the heart of your civilization has given you a temporary benefit in power. But eventually, your civilization will crumble and we will be there to laugh.

trans-unit.source: You are are war with our ally, {LEADERNAME:2}. Find a way to make peace or pay the consequences.
trans-unit.target: You are are war with our ally, {LEADERNAME:2}. Find a way to make peace or pay the consequences.

trans-unit.source: Our people admire your vast power, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: Our people admire your vast power, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: I cannot believe I'm talking to animated meat. How do you function?
trans-unit.target: I cannot believe I'm talking to animated meat. How do you function?

trans-unit.source: I just want to understand. You communicate by pushing air through a piece of meat that is located in a hole that you call your "mouth"?
trans-unit.target: I just want to understand. You communicate by pushing air through a piece of meat that is located in a hole that you call your "mouth"?

trans-unit.source: We continue to be astounded that you creatures exist. You're basically a sack of goo. How are you even created?
trans-unit.target: We continue to be astounded that you creatures exist. You're basically a sack of goo. How are you even created?

trans-unit.source: Seriously? Are you brazenly going to try to incite our people to rebel right in front of us?
trans-unit.target: Seriously? Are you brazenly going to try to incite our people to rebel right in front of us?

trans-unit.source: If you don't quit trying to culturally subjugate my people, we will be forced to declare war.
trans-unit.target: If you don't quit trying to culturally subjugate my people, we will be forced to declare war.

trans-unit.source: Your communication starbases are spreading your ugly culture too close to our worlds. Remove them.
trans-unit.target: Your communication starbases are spreading your ugly culture too close to our worlds. Remove them.

trans-unit.source: We do not appreciate your communication starbases so close to our planets.
trans-unit.target: We do not appreciate your communication starbases so close to our planets.

trans-unit.source: Your communication starbase is so close to our worlds that we are picking up your obnoxious entertainment.
trans-unit.target: Your communication starbase is so close to our worlds that we are picking up your obnoxious entertainment.

trans-unit.source: My daughter came by and told me about the amazing ways of your people. I asked her how had she heard about it and that's when I learned that you have a Cultural starbase inside our area of influence! Get rid of it.
trans-unit.target: My daughter came by and told me about the amazing ways of your people. I asked her how had she heard about it and that's when I learned that you have a Cultural starbase inside our area of influence! Get rid of it.

trans-unit.source: You seriously think you can culturally dominate humans? We have chocolate!
trans-unit.target: You seriously think you can culturally dominate humans? We have chocolate!

trans-unit.source: Your vile culture offends us. Remove your ridiculous starbases from our sphere of influence immediately.
trans-unit.target: Your vile culture offends us. Remove your ridiculous starbases from our sphere of influence immediately.

trans-unit.source: Your culture is no match for Torian Fire Chili.
trans-unit.target: Your culture is no match for Torian Fire Chili.

trans-unit.source: Our people have resisted Titans, Sorcerer Kings, and Fallen Enchantresses. We will resist your deplorable culture.
trans-unit.target: Our people have resisted Titans, Sorcerer Kings, and Fallen Enchantresses. We will resist your deplorable culture.

trans-unit.source: Our world is literally magical. Do you really think they will want to join you?
trans-unit.target: Our world is literally magical. Do you really think they will want to join you?

trans-unit.source: Stop trying to brainwash our people into following your vile culture immediately.
trans-unit.target: Stop trying to brainwash our people into following your vile culture immediately.

trans-unit.source: Our people are deeply spiritual. We will not continue to tolerate your cultural attacks on us.
trans-unit.target: Our people are deeply spiritual. We will not continue to tolerate your cultural attacks on us.

trans-unit.source: You are wasting your time. Our people cannot be culturally assimilated.
trans-unit.target: You are wasting your time. Our people cannot be culturally assimilated.

trans-unit.source: As non-biologics, we have no need for your culture. We are immune to it. Our worlds will never rebel.
trans-unit.target: As non-biologics, we have no need for your culture. We are immune to it. Our worlds will never rebel.

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in your culture. Did you think we wouldn't notice your starbase right next to our planets?
trans-unit.target: We have no interest in your culture. Did you think we wouldn't notice your starbase right next to our planets?

trans-unit.source: We already had to flee one world, we do not intend to be subjugated to an alien culture. Remove your starbases.
trans-unit.target: We already had to flee one world, we do not intend to be subjugated to an alien culture. Remove your starbases.

trans-unit.source: Be wary who you trade with. If you want to be our friend, do not trade with those who have despicable ideologies.
trans-unit.target: Be wary who you trade with. If you want to be our friend, do not trade with those who have despicable ideologies.

trans-unit.source: You should be aware that you are trading with a civilization whose culture represents everything we are against.
trans-unit.target: You should be aware that you are trading with a civilization whose culture represents everything we are against.

trans-unit.source:
We are getting a lot of reports from our people regarding the ease of working with your people.
The open borders treaty that exists between our peoples has greatly improved commerce and relations between our citizens and yours.
trans-unit.target:
We are getting a lot of reports from our people regarding the ease of working with your people.
The open borders treaty that exists between our peoples has greatly improved commerce and relations between our citizens and yours.

trans-unit.source: The open borders treaty has made navigation in this sector much easier. Thank you.
trans-unit.target: The open borders treaty has made navigation in this sector much easier. Thank you.

trans-unit.source: Soon, your worlds will be ours.
trans-unit.target: Soon, your worlds will be ours.

trans-unit.source: If you surrender now, we will show mercy.
trans-unit.target: If you surrender now, we will show mercy.

trans-unit.source: Your planets are ripe for conquest. Even now, my military advisors are urging me to take action.
trans-unit.target: Your planets are ripe for conquest. Even now, my military advisors are urging me to take action.

trans-unit.source: Your military is so weak that it is a miracle you haven't already been conquered.
trans-unit.target: Your military is so weak that it is a miracle you haven't already been conquered.

trans-unit.source: As much as we love capitalism, we do not appreciate you intentionally trying to incite our people to join you. Remove your starbases, or else.
trans-unit.target: As much as we love capitalism, we do not appreciate you intentionally trying to incite our people to join you. Remove your starbases, or else.

trans-unit.source: Our mutual trade continues to strengthen our relationship.
trans-unit.target: Our mutual trade continues to strengthen our relationship.

trans-unit.source: We are finding that our trading relationship is building a sense of trust between our people.
trans-unit.target: We are finding that our trading relationship is building a sense of trust between our people.

trans-unit.source: Our shared borders are making my advisors irritable. Make sure you stay on your side.
trans-unit.target: Our shared borders are making my advisors irritable. Make sure you stay on your side.

trans-unit.source: We admit we don't respect your borders. Perhaps it's time for an open borders treaty?
trans-unit.target: We admit we don't respect your borders. Perhaps it's time for an open borders treaty?

trans-unit.source: There is tension due to our close borders. An open borders treaty would alleviate this.
trans-unit.target: There is tension due to our close borders. An open borders treaty would alleviate this.

trans-unit.source: You should be aware that our military is quite annoyed with your starbase. You should negotiate an open borders treaty with us.
trans-unit.target: You should be aware that our military is quite annoyed with your starbase. You should negotiate an open borders treaty with us.

trans-unit.source: While we do not plan to attack your ships that trespass, be aware that they cause us some consternation. If you want to travel through our zone of influence, negotiate an open borders treaty.
trans-unit.target: While we do not plan to attack your ships that trespass, be aware that they cause us some consternation. If you want to travel through our zone of influence, negotiate an open borders treaty.

trans-unit.source: We have concerns about your armed ships traveling near our worlds without an open borders treaty.
trans-unit.target: We have concerns about your armed ships traveling near our worlds without an open borders treaty.

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain good relations with us, then don't send armed ships into our space without an open borders treaty.
trans-unit.target: If you want to maintain good relations with us, then don't send armed ships into our space without an open borders treaty.

trans-unit.source: We do not appreciate having military vessels traveling into our space without a treaty.
trans-unit.target: We do not appreciate having military vessels traveling into our space without a treaty.

trans-unit.source: Our ultimate goal is to conquer the galaxy. When we ultimately consume you, we want you to know that it wasn't personal.
trans-unit.target: Our ultimate goal is to conquer the galaxy. When we ultimately consume you, we want you to know that it wasn't personal.

trans-unit.source: Our people desire for galactic conquest.
trans-unit.target: Our people desire for galactic conquest.

trans-unit.source: You colonized a planet within our zone of influence. We won't necessarily go to war over that, but don't be surprised if the people of that world ultimately decide to join us.
trans-unit.target: You colonized a planet within our zone of influence. We won't necessarily go to war over that, but don't be surprised if the people of that world ultimately decide to join us.

trans-unit.source: What exactly is your long-term plan? My military advisors tell me that your civilization would be safer under our rule, given your lack of military power.
trans-unit.target: What exactly is your long-term plan? My military advisors tell me that your civilization would be safer under our rule, given your lack of military power.

trans-unit.source: Have you considered giving your worlds to us? Your people would be much safer under our protection.
trans-unit.target: Have you considered giving your worlds to us? Your people would be much safer under our protection.

trans-unit.source: Your lack of military power is making you an easy target for would-be conquerors.
trans-unit.target: Your lack of military power is making you an easy target for would-be conquerors.

trans-unit.source: Your worlds...so poorly defended. So ripe for conquest.
trans-unit.target: Your worlds...so poorly defended. So ripe for conquest.

trans-unit.source: We appreciate your pacifism. It will make your eventual conquest that much easier.
trans-unit.target: We appreciate your pacifism. It will make your eventual conquest that much easier.

trans-unit.source: You have no idea how fortunate you are that we are busy with other things. Your pitiful military and rich worlds are calling to us. Do you understand?
trans-unit.target: You have no idea how fortunate you are that we are busy with other things. Your pitiful military and rich worlds are calling to us. Do you understand?

trans-unit.source: Your people are calling upon us to learn the proper way to live.
trans-unit.target: Your people are calling upon us to learn the proper way to live.

trans-unit.source: There is so much blasphemy on your worlds. It may soon be time to bring a proper moral order to them.
trans-unit.target: There is so much blasphemy on your worlds. It may soon be time to bring a proper moral order to them.

trans-unit.source: Your people call out for redemption from their sins. We may be the instrument of their salvation.
trans-unit.target: Your people call out for redemption from their sins. We may be the instrument of their salvation.

trans-unit.source: Your worlds are full of beings ripe for the feeding. You are like cattle waiting to be slaughtered.
trans-unit.target: Your worlds are full of beings ripe for the feeding. You are like cattle waiting to be slaughtered.

trans-unit.source: Your planets are so tempting to us. Our shock troops can be a bit sadistic, but in time, I suspect you will come to appreciate them.
trans-unit.target: Your planets are so tempting to us. Our shock troops can be a bit sadistic, but in time, I suspect you will come to appreciate them.

trans-unit.source: Your planets are ripe for the taking. Traditionally, we flay our victims alive, but if you wish to turn over your worlds over to us voluntarily, we will... well, let's be serious. We'll still flay you alive.
trans-unit.target: Your planets are ripe for the taking. Traditionally, we flay our victims alive, but if you wish to turn over your worlds over to us voluntarily, we will... well, let's be serious. We'll still flay you alive.

trans-unit.source: The Universe is a dance of energy, infinite and eternal. Life is a song that blends in perfect harmony.
trans-unit.target: The Universe is a dance of energy, infinite and eternal. Life is a song that blends in perfect harmony.

trans-unit.source: Raised by squatters in a destitute factory.
trans-unit.target: Raised by squatters in a destitute factory.

trans-unit.source: Trained a bit as a chef, always wanted to open a restaurant.
trans-unit.target: Trained a bit as a chef, always wanted to open a restaurant.

trans-unit.source: Formerly brain washed by religious cultists.
trans-unit.target: Formerly brain washed by religious cultists.

trans-unit.source: Suffers from claustrophobia, hates being in spaceships.
trans-unit.target: Suffers from claustrophobia, hates being in spaceships.

trans-unit.source: Has no friends or family outside of their political party.
trans-unit.target: Has no friends or family outside of their political party.

trans-unit.source: Failed out of medical school. Doesn't like talking about it.
trans-unit.target: Failed out of medical school. Doesn't like talking about it.

trans-unit.source: Avoided military service thanks to family connections.
trans-unit.target: Avoided military service thanks to family connections.

trans-unit.source: Excluded from a family inheritance and terribly bitter about it.
trans-unit.target: Excluded from a family inheritance and terribly bitter about it.

trans-unit.source: Scarred in a duel with a romantic rival. They won though.
trans-unit.target: Scarred in a duel with a romantic rival. They won though.

trans-unit.source: Lost their sense of smell in an industrial accident.
trans-unit.target: Lost their sense of smell in an industrial accident.

trans-unit.source: Spent their youth in a Tibetan monastery.
trans-unit.target: Spent their youth in a Tibetan monastery.

trans-unit.source: A former wharf rat, escaped from the slums of a port city.
trans-unit.target: A former wharf rat, escaped from the slums of a port city.

trans-unit.source: Had military parents, spent years moving around the solar system.
trans-unit.target: Had military parents, spent years moving around the solar system.

trans-unit.source: A former sailor, used to spending months alone at sea.
trans-unit.target: A former sailor, used to spending months alone at sea.

trans-unit.source: A career diplomat, who loves understanding all the details.
trans-unit.target: A career diplomat, who loves understanding all the details.

trans-unit.source: Lost two toes from frostbite in a mountaineering accident.
trans-unit.target: Lost two toes from frostbite in a mountaineering accident.

trans-unit.source: A former engineer, easily distracted by minute details.
trans-unit.target: A former engineer, easily distracted by minute details.

trans-unit.source: Badly burnt in a cooking accident as a child.
trans-unit.target: Badly burnt in a cooking accident as a child.

trans-unit.source: Grooms themselves to look identical long dead friend.
trans-unit.target: Grooms themselves to look identical long dead friend.

trans-unit.source: Constantly flipping a coin of alien origin.
trans-unit.target: Constantly flipping a coin of alien origin.

trans-unit.source: Has been known to violently enforce the use of proper grammar.
trans-unit.target: Has been known to violently enforce the use of proper grammar.

trans-unit.source: Insists the Precursors still walk among us in disguise.
trans-unit.target: Insists the Precursors still walk among us in disguise.

trans-unit.source: Loves to sing, but has a dreadful sense of pitch, rhythm, and harmony.
trans-unit.target: Loves to sing, but has a dreadful sense of pitch, rhythm, and harmony.

trans-unit.source: Loves to assign humiliating pet names to their advisors.
trans-unit.target: Loves to assign humiliating pet names to their advisors.

trans-unit.source: Has a terrible sense of humor.
trans-unit.target: Has a terrible sense of humor.

trans-unit.source: Is guided by two dueling voices in their head, whose combined advice never fails.
trans-unit.target: Is guided by two dueling voices in their head, whose combined advice never fails.

trans-unit.source: Once accidentally committed an act of cannibalism.
trans-unit.target: Once accidentally committed an act of cannibalism.

trans-unit.source: Meticulous and organized, undertook extensive training to be an archivist.
trans-unit.target: Meticulous and organized, undertook extensive training to be an archivist.

trans-unit.source: Is menaced by anonymous death threats that arrive from some unknown entity.
trans-unit.target: Is menaced by anonymous death threats that arrive from some unknown entity.

trans-unit.source: Serves at the pleasure of a secret organization who could kill them at any moment.
trans-unit.target: Serves at the pleasure of a secret organization who could kill them at any moment.

trans-unit.source: Experiences synaesthesia when speaking with alien species.
trans-unit.target: Experiences synaesthesia when speaking with alien species.

trans-unit.source: Carries the skull of their former nemesis with them.
trans-unit.target: Carries the skull of their former nemesis with them.

trans-unit.source: Spent decades under a vow of silence, communicating with no-one.
trans-unit.target: Spent decades under a vow of silence, communicating with no-one.

trans-unit.source: Was trapped on a colony ship adrift for many decades.
trans-unit.target: Was trapped on a colony ship adrift for many decades.

trans-unit.source: Diligently works every day on their autobiography.
trans-unit.target: Diligently works every day on their autobiography.

trans-unit.source: Has a terrible stutter, and crippling fear of public speaking.
trans-unit.target: Has a terrible stutter, and crippling fear of public speaking.

trans-unit.source: Was the only survivor of a training accident at a military academy.
trans-unit.target: Was the only survivor of a training accident at a military academy.

trans-unit.source: Is terrified of their own reflection.
trans-unit.target: Is terrified of their own reflection.

trans-unit.source: Trained to be a scientist but didn't have the aptitude.
trans-unit.target: Trained to be a scientist but didn't have the aptitude.

trans-unit.source: Encountered a space faring monster, is now obsessed with finding it again.
trans-unit.target: Encountered a space faring monster, is now obsessed with finding it again.

trans-unit.source: Due to an unknown childhood incident, refuses to be in a poorly lit room or space.
trans-unit.target: Due to an unknown childhood incident, refuses to be in a poorly lit room or space.

trans-unit.source: Is obsessed with genealogy, and fully convinced ancestral knowledge is real.
trans-unit.target: Is obsessed with genealogy, and fully convinced ancestral knowledge is real.

trans-unit.source: Loudly insists they are the reincarnation of a great leader from ancient history.
trans-unit.target: Loudly insists they are the reincarnation of a great leader from ancient history.

trans-unit.source: Possesses a mysterious artifact which prevents them from casting a shadow.
trans-unit.target: Possesses a mysterious artifact which prevents them from casting a shadow.

trans-unit.source: Was raised by their parent's enemies as a hostage.
trans-unit.target: Was raised by their parent's enemies as a hostage.

trans-unit.source: Is the last member of an ancient bloodline.
trans-unit.target: Is the last member of an ancient bloodline.

trans-unit.source: Is quite likely the child of prophecy who will lead people to greatness or doom.
trans-unit.target: Is quite likely the child of prophecy who will lead people to greatness or doom.

trans-unit.source: Prefers verbal communication, even to the point of shredding documents, unread.
