trans-unit.target: Prefers verbal communication, even to the point of shredding documents, unread.

trans-unit.source: A merciless disciplinarian, who expects perfection from their subordinates.
trans-unit.target: A merciless disciplinarian, who expects perfection from their subordinates.

trans-unit.source: Faced many accusations of having 'impure' beliefs. The accusations were true.
trans-unit.target: Faced many accusations of having 'impure' beliefs. The accusations were true.

trans-unit.source: Was once framed for the murder of a political rival.
trans-unit.target: Was once framed for the murder of a political rival.

trans-unit.source: Comes from a family which secretly backs space piracy.
trans-unit.target: Comes from a family which secretly backs space piracy.

trans-unit.source: Has been handed everything to them on a silver platter. Never been challenged.
trans-unit.target: Has been handed everything to them on a silver platter. Never been challenged.

trans-unit.source: A lucid dreamer, who uses their dreams to rehearse important meetings.
trans-unit.target: A lucid dreamer, who uses their dreams to rehearse important meetings.

trans-unit.source: Has survived a hostile encounter with Irradiated lifeforms.
trans-unit.target: Has survived a hostile encounter with Irradiated lifeforms.

trans-unit.source: Has a cracked hand they can't use very much.
trans-unit.target: Has a cracked hand they can't use very much.

trans-unit.source: Telepathically shares emotions with others but struggles to read minds clearly.
trans-unit.target: Telepathically shares emotions with others but struggles to read minds clearly.

trans-unit.source: Wrote a series of popular romance novels under a poorly maintained pseudonym.
trans-unit.target: Wrote a series of popular romance novels under a poorly maintained pseudonym.

trans-unit.source: Served on a commission that oversaw plans for the development of new weapons.

trans-unit.source: [I]Immitate a shrugging gesture with a few tentacles.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Immitate a shrugging gesture with a few tentacles.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Hold out a stone of nearly incomprehensible color.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: [I]Hold out a stone of nearly incomprehensible color.[/I] [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Opens Trade)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: [I]There's a moment of silence. Even with the Universal Translator, communicating verbally appears impossible. The creature seems relaxed, tentacles waving at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]There's a moment of silence. Even with the Universal Translator, communicating verbally appears impossible. The creature seems relaxed, tentacles waving at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: You are quite possibly the most disturbing thing I have ever seen. I'm sure you get that a lot.
trans-unit.target: You are quite possibly the most disturbing thing I have ever seen. I'm sure you get that a lot.

trans-unit.source: Now, how did you- You're not one of our larvas.
trans-unit.target: Now, how did you- You're not one of our larvas.

trans-unit.source: Salutations? We hope you are open to friendly diplomatic relations.
trans-unit.target: Salutations? We hope you are open to friendly diplomatic relations.

trans-unit.source: If you're not edible and don't make good slaves, then you'll be happy to know we'll probably destroy you last.
trans-unit.target: If you're not edible and don't make good slaves, then you'll be happy to know we'll probably destroy you last.

trans-unit.source: We will try to show you the same respect all life, and we hope you'll prove more sentient than you look.
trans-unit.target: We will try to show you the same respect all life, and we hope you'll prove more sentient than you look.

trans-unit.source: As foul and astray as you appear, accept The Way, and we may manage your salvation.
trans-unit.target: As foul and astray as you appear, accept The Way, and we may manage your salvation.

trans-unit.source: Are you familiar with the laws of economics? If not, we'd happily induct you into the interstellar market.
trans-unit.target: Are you familiar with the laws of economics? If not, we'd happily induct you into the interstellar market.

trans-unit.source: Are you some form of befouled root system?
trans-unit.target: Are you some form of befouled root system?

trans-unit.source: Oh! You're, ummm, interesting. I represent the Terran Resistance. Let's find some common ground.
trans-unit.target: Oh! You're, ummm, interesting. I represent the Terran Resistance. Let's find some common ground.

trans-unit.source: When did your malformed ilk learn to construct and use a communicator? Have you any need of it? Since when did sentient races make deals with oversized diseases?
trans-unit.target: When did your malformed ilk learn to construct and use a communicator? Have you any need of it? Since when did sentient races make deals with oversized diseases?

trans-unit.source: I have boots more threatening than you. Squirm away on your rotting worlds, and I might delay your extermination.
trans-unit.target: I have boots more threatening than you. Squirm away on your rotting worlds, and I might delay your extermination.

trans-unit.source: [I]The organism on the screen before you squirms like some deeply discomforting nightmare.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The organism on the screen before you squirms like some deeply discomforting nightmare.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The flailing creature on the screen resembles a larva if you ignore the haphazard growth of appendages and eyes.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The flailing creature on the screen resembles a larva if you ignore the haphazard growth of appendages and eyes.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The revolting worm-like creature dares to try and make eye contact.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The revolting worm-like creature dares to try and make eye contact.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The organic life before you does not match any currently understood evolutionary trend. Mute == true.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The organic life before you does not match any currently understood evolutionary trend. Mute == true.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Even as diverse as the oceans are, nothing quite like the creature undulating on screen has been recorded before.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Even as diverse as the oceans are, nothing quite like the creature undulating on screen has been recorded before.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]A mass of organic matter shifts about on the screen. It fails to produce sound but makes many nondescript motions with various appendages and eyes.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]A mass of organic matter shifts about on the screen. It fails to produce sound but makes many nondescript motions with various appendages and eyes.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]A few sharp movements couple the silence of the indecipherable alien on the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]A few sharp movements couple the silence of the indecipherable alien on the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The flailing lifeform before you looks soft, weak, and (most revoltingly) like it'd taste horrible.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The flailing lifeform before you looks soft, weak, and (most revoltingly) like it'd taste horrible.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Before you is an Irradiated, a race that makes up the Cosmic Contaminant. Beyond their presence in the galaxy, very little is known beyond they can not verbally communicate.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Before you is an Irradiated, a race that makes up the Cosmic Contaminant. Beyond their presence in the galaxy, very little is known beyond they can not verbally communicate.[/I]

trans-unit.source: Umm, hello? Let's try to get along, I guess.
trans-unit.target: Umm, hello? Let's try to get along, I guess.

trans-unit.source: [I]Wave a few tentacles at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Wave a few tentacles at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Squirm in a way that imitates nodding.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Squirm in a way that imitates nodding.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Wave a tentacle in dismissal of the brute.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Wave a tentacle in dismissal of the brute.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Hold up a few shiny objects in affirmation.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Hold up a few shiny objects in affirmation.[/I]

trans-unit.source: Well. This meeting has been eventful.
trans-unit.target: Well. This meeting has been eventful.

trans-unit.source: I can't possibly tell if you're groveling or not.
trans-unit.target: I can't possibly tell if you're groveling or not.

trans-unit.source: What extreme circumstances must have produced you.
trans-unit.target: What extreme circumstances must have produced you.

trans-unit.source: Come, learn The Way. There is absolution for all.
trans-unit.target: Come, learn The Way. There is absolution for all.

trans-unit.source: Per first contact protocol: Greetings, we come in peace.
trans-unit.target: Per first contact protocol: Greetings, we come in peace.

trans-unit.source: The nicest thing I can say is you're a waste of my time.
trans-unit.target: The nicest thing I can say is you're a waste of my time.

trans-unit.source: We hope that we may understand each other over time.
trans-unit.target: We hope that we may understand each other over time.

trans-unit.source: [I]Maintain intense eye contact till surreptitiously closing the Incoming Message.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Maintain intense eye contact till surreptitiously closing the Incoming Message.[/I]

trans-unit.source: The less I have to see of you, the better.
trans-unit.target: The less I have to see of you, the better.

trans-unit.source: [I]Wave a dismissive tentacle at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Wave a dismissive tentacle at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Curl a threatening tentacle at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Curl a threatening tentacle at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Roll eyes before waving dismissively at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Roll eyes before waving dismissively at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Maintain distasteful eye contact till they hang up.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Maintain distasteful eye contact till they hang up.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Stare at the screen to instill discomfort.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Stare at the screen to instill discomfort.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Angrily throw the closest loose object at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Angrily throw the closest loose object at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: Your warm squirming mass is perfect for our eggs.
trans-unit.target: Your warm squirming mass is perfect for our eggs.

trans-unit.source: Utterly foul. Do not try to contact me again.
trans-unit.target: Utterly foul. Do not try to contact me again.

trans-unit.source: There is something profoundly discomforting about looking at you.
trans-unit.target: There is something profoundly discomforting about looking at you.

trans-unit.source: Stay clear of The Way, and we'll extend mercy.
trans-unit.target: Stay clear of The Way, and we'll extend mercy.

trans-unit.source: Per the possible parasitic lifeform addendum: This is your warning.
trans-unit.target: Per the possible parasitic lifeform addendum: This is your warning.

trans-unit.source: Riding the universe of your weakness should be easy enough.
trans-unit.target: Riding the universe of your weakness should be easy enough.

trans-unit.source: We have yet to determine whether you are truly dangerous.
trans-unit.target: We have yet to determine whether you are truly dangerous.

trans-unit.source: [I]The lifeform crushes something small in one of its tentacles. They just conquered one of your worlds.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The lifeform crushes something small in one of its tentacles. They just conquered one of your worlds.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: [I]The squirming lifeform throws something at the screen, maintaining an intense glower.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: [I]Throw a pile of sludge at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Throw a pile of sludge at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The mass of organic matter on the screen holds out a scrap of something white, seeming to ask for an end to the ongoing conflict.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The mass of organic matter on the screen holds out a scrap of something white, seeming to ask for an end to the ongoing conflict.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Hold up a tentacle to signal agreement.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Hold up a tentacle to signal agreement.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Squirm to indicate discomfort with the current terms but avoid complete disagreement.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Squirm to indicate discomfort with the current terms but avoid complete disagreement.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Writhe in mock laughter to downright refuse the request.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Writhe in mock laughter to downright refuse the request.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]A loose object is tossed to the side before appendages flailed threateningly, the offer refused.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]A loose object is tossed to the side before appendages flailed threateningly, the offer refused.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The entity on screen frantically writhes, glancing about manically. What few appendages it spares wave you away.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The entity on screen frantically writhes, glancing about manically. What few appendages it spares wave you away.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The entity on screen angrily writhes, frantic in their erratic motions and behavior. They're quite preoccupied with the Everwar. In the short time it's on-screen several indiscernible items are thrown at the screen.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The entity on screen angrily writhes, frantic in their erratic motions and behavior. They're quite preoccupied with the Everwar. In the short time it's on-screen several indiscernible items are thrown at the screen.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The entity on screen jostles in what could generously be called laughter. It waves a dismissive tentacle, refusing to help now that the galaxy has turned on you.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The entity on screen jostles in what could generously be called laughter. It waves a dismissive tentacle, refusing to help now that the galaxy has turned on you.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The entity on-screen looks shocked and confused, at least as close as it can, given its appearance. It gestures widely around. They're just as preoccupied with the apocalypse as anyone.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The entity on-screen looks shocked and confused, at least as close as it can, given its appearance. It gestures widely around. They're just as preoccupied with the apocalypse as anyone.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Shakes angrily at the screen, the trade unacceptable.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Shakes angrily at the screen, the trade unacceptable.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The mute alien waves happily at the screen after accepting the trade offer.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The mute alien waves happily at the screen after accepting the trade offer.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Stares patiently at the screen awaiting your offer.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Stares patiently at the screen awaiting your offer.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Gestures broadly at some new items added to the trade.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Gestures broadly at some new items added to the trade.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Make the most threatening gesture you can think of; surely they'll understand it means war![/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Make the most threatening gesture you can think of; surely they'll understand it means war![/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Hold up a weapon to indicate your intent to go to war.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Hold up a weapon to indicate your intent to go to war.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Make several elaborate gestures in an attempt to communicate your desire for peace.[/I] (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)
trans-unit.target: [I]Make several elaborate gestures in an attempt to communicate your desire for peace.[/I] (you need to research Universal Translator in order to negotiate for peace)

trans-unit.source: [I]Hold out a white object to indicate your intentions to negotiate for peace.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Hold out a white object to indicate your intentions to negotiate for peace.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The lifeform glowers at the screen, the intense gaze filling with anger.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The lifeform glowers at the screen, the intense gaze filling with anger.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The chaotic writhing message is utterly indecipherable, the only sound coming from the communication being a low bubbling background noise.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The lifeform barely makes eye contact, a dismissive tentacle indicating a lack of interest in communicating.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The lifeform barely makes eye contact, a dismissive tentacle indicating a lack of interest in communicating.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The entity on screen responds with deeply discomforting movements.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The entity on screen responds with deeply discomforting movements.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The entity on screen writhes in anger, tentacles curling in a clear threat.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The entity on screen writhes in anger, tentacles curling in a clear threat.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Perform a typical gesture of aggression that probably doesn't translate.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Perform a typical gesture of aggression that probably doesn't translate.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Stare astutely at the screen to instill a deep discomfort.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Stare astutely at the screen to instill a deep discomfort.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Adjust behavior sharply to seem relaxed, avoiding instigating war at the last moment.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Adjust behavior sharply to seem relaxed, avoiding instigating war at the last moment.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]Wave several dismissive, joking tentacles to avoid instigating a war.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]Wave several dismissive, joking tentacles to avoid instigating a war.[/I]

trans-unit.source: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]
trans-unit.target: [I]The Irradiated lifeform stares at the screen patiently.[/I]

trans-unit.source: Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.
trans-unit.target: Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.

trans-unit.source: Understands the grandeur that reduces life to transient incidents.
trans-unit.target: Understands the grandeur that reduces life to transient incidents.

trans-unit.source: Will only discuss thoughts and dreams.
trans-unit.target: Will only discuss thoughts and dreams.

trans-unit.source: Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.
trans-unit.target: Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.

trans-unit.source: Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.
trans-unit.target: Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.

trans-unit.source: Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.

trans-unit.source: Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.
trans-unit.target: Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.

trans-unit.source: Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.
trans-unit.target: Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.

trans-unit.source: Considers time and space incidental considerations.
trans-unit.target: Considers time and space incidental considerations.

trans-unit.source: Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.
trans-unit.target: Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.

trans-unit.source: Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.
trans-unit.target: Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.

trans-unit.source: Searches the stars for something unknown.
trans-unit.target: Searches the stars for something unknown.

trans-unit.source: Witnessed that which should not be.
trans-unit.target: Witnessed that which should not be.

trans-unit.source: Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.
trans-unit.target: Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.

trans-unit.target: Understands the grandeur that reduces life to transient incidents.

trans-unit.target: Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.

trans-unit.target: Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.

trans-unit.target: Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.

trans-unit.target: Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.

trans-unit.target: Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.

trans-unit.target: Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.

trans-unit.target: Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.

trans-unit.target: Searches the stars for something unknown.

trans-unit.target: Witnessed that which should not be.

trans-unit.target: Tells stories of the strange aeons they've survived.

trans-unit.target: Understands the grandeur that reduces life to transient incidents.

trans-unit.target: Will only discuss thoughts and dreams.

trans-unit.source: Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.
trans-unit.target: Sees the universe as a comic, with sentience being the joke.

trans-unit.source: Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.
trans-unit.target: Envies those whose minds can not correlate the contents of the universe.

trans-unit.source: Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.
trans-unit.target: Seeks to strain the sciences in a single direction.

trans-unit.source: Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.
trans-unit.target: Witnessed dark planets traversing the cosmos without aim.

trans-unit.source: Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.
trans-unit.target: Does not envy the ignorant or their placid lives.

trans-unit.source: Considers time and space incidental considerations.
trans-unit.target: Considers time and space incidental considerations.

trans-unit.source: Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.
trans-unit.target: Frequently sketches runes in hidden places.

trans-unit.source: Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.
trans-unit.target: Struggles to distinguish between possibility and reality.

trans-unit.source: Searches the stars for something unknown.
trans-unit.target: Searches the stars for something unknown.

trans-unit.source: Witnessed that which should not be.
trans-unit.target: Witnessed that which should not be.

trans-unit.source: Let's keep this short. I only need to know what your kind looks like to know what to hunt for when we've shattered your worlds and broken your wills.
trans-unit.target: Let's keep this short. I only need to know what your kind looks like to know what to hunt for when we've shattered your worlds and broken your wills.

trans-unit.source: The universe belongs to the Korath and the Korath alone. We will wipe out any that dare exist in our presence.
trans-unit.target: The universe belongs to the Korath and the Korath alone. We will wipe out any that dare exist in our presence.

trans-unit.source: Run and cry to whatever you think will save you from extinction at the hands of the Korath.
trans-unit.target: Run and cry to whatever you think will save you from extinction at the hands of the Korath.

trans-unit.source: I see even the Empire's rejects have managed to survive. I guess we can try to get along if your mood has improved.
trans-unit.target: I see even the Empire's rejects have managed to survive. I guess we can try to get along if your mood has improved.

trans-unit.source: Your deal with the ill forces of the galaxy will doom all. If it's of use, we'd beseech you to reconsider your course through history.
trans-unit.target: Your deal with the ill forces of the galaxy will doom all. If it's of use, we'd beseech you to reconsider your course through history.

trans-unit.source: Oh, no. I had really hoped the rumors were false.
trans-unit.target: Oh, no. I had really hoped the rumors were false.

trans-unit.source: So, the prodigal Clan returns. Have you come to bend knee once more to the Empire? Return as our shock troops, and the universe will know the terror of a united Empire.
trans-unit.target: So, the prodigal Clan returns. Have you come to bend knee once more to the Empire? Return as our shock troops, and the universe will know the terror of a united Empire.

trans-unit.source: Are the Drengin bickering between themselves now? Is your desire for conflict really that boundless?
trans-unit.target: Are the Drengin bickering between themselves now? Is your desire for conflict really that boundless?

trans-unit.source: No matter what you call yourself, I have no mercy for Drengin.
trans-unit.target: No matter what you call yourself, I have no mercy for Drengin.

trans-unit.source: No! This can't be. I thought the Korath Clan was wiped out when the Empire fell.
trans-unit.target: No! This can't be. I thought the Korath Clan was wiped out when the Empire fell.

trans-unit.source: Good, the Alliance survives. I'd hate to have never been unable to exact revenge.
trans-unit.target: Good, the Alliance survives. I'd hate to have never been unable to exact revenge.

trans-unit.source: Know that the Korath Clan does not honor whatever mercy the Drengin Empire may have extended. No act can save you from extinction.
trans-unit.target: Know that the Korath Clan does not honor whatever mercy the Drengin Empire may have extended. No act can save you from extinction.

trans-unit.source: The fact your frail, small kind has been allowed to survive is a testament to how weak the universe allows itself to be. We'll be sure to rectify this.
trans-unit.target: The fact your frail, small kind has been allowed to survive is a testament to how weak the universe allows itself to be. We'll be sure to rectify this.

trans-unit.source: The Empire failed! Your chains do nothing but bind you to the weak. The only course forward is annihilation! The Korath Clan will carry on the Drengin legacy. We have no use for your weakness.
trans-unit.target: The Empire failed! Your chains do nothing but bind you to the weak. The only course forward is annihilation! The Korath Clan will carry on the Drengin legacy. We have no use for your weakness.

trans-unit.source: Don't think we'll spare you just because you're made of metal. Extinction will come for you all the same, and we'll use your broken bodies to repair our weapons and ships.
trans-unit.target: Don't think we'll spare you just because you're made of metal. Extinction will come for you all the same, and we'll use your broken bodies to repair our weapons and ships.

trans-unit.source: You survived. Another failing of the Empire. The Korath Clan won't make the same mistake.
trans-unit.target: You survived. Another failing of the Empire. The Korath Clan won't make the same mistake.

trans-unit.source: We've found you. You spent so long cowering in corners of the universe, but we won't lose you this time. The Korath Clan will finally snuff out your group of survivors.
trans-unit.target: We've found you. You spent so long cowering in corners of the universe, but we won't lose you this time. The Korath Clan will finally snuff out your group of survivors.

trans-unit.source: This must be a joke. You can't possibly have survived this long.
trans-unit.target: This must be a joke. You can't possibly have survived this long.

trans-unit.source: I hope only some of our meetings are this hostile.
trans-unit.target: I hope only some of our meetings are this hostile.

trans-unit.source: Watch your tongue, or I'll pull it from your screaming head.
trans-unit.target: Watch your tongue, or I'll pull it from your screaming head.

trans-unit.source: You forget the Korath Clan does not extend mercy.
trans-unit.target: You forget the Korath Clan does not extend mercy.

trans-unit.source: Hope is a common mistake among the weak.
trans-unit.target: Hope is a common mistake among the weak.

trans-unit.source: Ha! Weak Drengin, like those of the Empire, are no Drengin.
trans-unit.target: Ha! Weak Drengin, like those of the Empire, are no Drengin.

trans-unit.source: Mind yourself! The Korath Clan needs no reason to annihilate the weak.
trans-unit.target: Mind yourself! The Korath Clan needs no reason to annihilate the weak.

trans-unit.source: There is nothing strong enough to wipe out the Korath Clan.
trans-unit.target: There is nothing strong enough to wipe out the Korath Clan.

trans-unit.source: We don't need to keep up this hostility.
trans-unit.target: We don't need to keep up this hostility.

trans-unit.source: I hope you'll reconsider if given time.
trans-unit.target: I hope you'll reconsider if given time.

trans-unit.source: You'll find us more resilient than we look.
trans-unit.target: You'll find us more resilient than we look.

trans-unit.source: Mind your tongue! You're nothing but a rebellious legion.
trans-unit.target: Mind your tongue! You're nothing but a rebellious legion.

trans-unit.source: Threat registered. We anticipate a change in results.
trans-unit.target: Threat registered. We anticipate a change in results.

trans-unit.source: Threaten all you like. I refuse to fear you.
trans-unit.target: Threaten all you like. I refuse to fear you.

trans-unit.source: The Resistance is prepared for the worst you can manage.
trans-unit.target: The Resistance is prepared for the worst you can manage.

trans-unit.source: I'll wait until you're done with your tantrum.
trans-unit.target: I'll wait until you're done with your tantrum.

trans-unit.source: Laugh while you can. The Korath clan will see to your extinction soon enough.
trans-unit.target: Laugh while you can. The Korath clan will see to your extinction soon enough.

trans-unit.source: Our course through history will be one of conquest.
trans-unit.target: Our course through history will be one of conquest.

trans-unit.source: Surrender and the Korath put you and your fears to rest.
trans-unit.target: Surrender and the Korath put you and your fears to rest.

trans-unit.source: You offer chains; we'll offer relief from your humiliation through death.
trans-unit.target: You offer chains; we'll offer relief from your humiliation through death.

trans-unit.source: Remember this as the moment you ensured your own extinction.
trans-unit.target: Remember this as the moment you ensured your own extinction.

trans-unit.source: No longer bound by the Empire's rules, the Korath can finally wipe you out of existence.
trans-unit.target: No longer bound by the Empire's rules, the Korath can finally wipe you out of existence.

trans-unit.source: And I thought your petty Resistance had been stomped out.
trans-unit.target: And I thought your petty Resistance had been stomped out.

trans-unit.source: Try, and I'll be happy to remind you what we did to the Empire.
trans-unit.target: Try, and I'll be happy to remind you what we did to the Empire.

trans-unit.source: You've been beaten before; you'll be beaten again. I'm not gonna worry.
trans-unit.target: You've been beaten before; you'll be beaten again. I'm not gonna worry.

trans-unit.source: There's only one thing to do with a rabid war dog.
trans-unit.target: There's only one thing to do with a rabid war dog.

trans-unit.source: You're hardly as threatening as you think. I'm terminating this communication.
trans-unit.target: You're hardly as threatening as you think. I'm terminating this communication.

trans-unit.source: The Resistance is familiar with your tactics. You're no threat to us.
trans-unit.target: The Resistance is familiar with your tactics. You're no threat to us.

trans-unit.source: Your continued resistance is futile. The Korath will see to your extinction.
trans-unit.target: Your continued resistance is futile. The Korath will see to your extinction.

trans-unit.source: We've let you languish long enough. The time has come to rip your civilization apart and rid the galaxy of your ilk![BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: We've let you languish long enough. The time has come to rip your civilization apart and rid the galaxy of your ilk![BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You've been a thorn in the Drengin's side long enough. It's time to stomp you out. In a decade's time, no one will remember the Terran Alliance.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: You've been a thorn in the Drengin's side long enough. It's time to stomp you out. In a decade's time, no one will remember the Terran Alliance.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: You've avoided your fate long enough. The Korath will stomp out your petty band of outcasts.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]
trans-unit.target: You've avoided your fate long enough. The Korath will stomp out your petty band of outcasts.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](We are at war)[/COLOR]

trans-unit.source: If you're not here to surrender to your extinction by the Korath Clan, what do you want?
trans-unit.target: If you're not here to surrender to your extinction by the Korath Clan, what do you want?

trans-unit.source: Rethink that offer before I pull you apart.
trans-unit.target: Rethink that offer before I pull you apart.

trans-unit.source: Don't think this trade ensures your safety.
trans-unit.target: Don't think this trade ensures your safety.

trans-unit.source: Make this trade worth my time, or I'll forcefully take it.
trans-unit.target: Make this trade worth my time, or I'll forcefully take it.

trans-unit.source: You think yourself worthy to speak to the Korath?
trans-unit.target: You think yourself worthy to speak to the Korath?

trans-unit.source: It is rare to meet someone that we believe is an equal to us. It is perplexing. Let us haggle.
trans-unit.target: It is rare to meet someone that we believe is an equal to us. It is perplexing. Let us haggle.

trans-unit.source: Despite you being some sort of animated meat, we have come to appreciate you if not your kind. Let us begin negotiations.
trans-unit.target: Despite you being some sort of animated meat, we have come to appreciate you if not your kind. Let us begin negotiations.

trans-unit.source: You seem more intelligent than most of the entities we have encountered in this area of space. To that end, we propose the a trade.
trans-unit.target: You seem more intelligent than most of the entities we have encountered in this area of space. To that end, we propose the a trade.

trans-unit.source: It is good to see you, {LEADERNAME:1}. As your friends we wish to ensure that you are supplied with our latest goods.
trans-unit.target: It is good to see you, {LEADERNAME:1}. As your friends we wish to ensure that you are supplied with our latest goods.

trans-unit.source: We have decided not to try to eat you. We have become accustomed to your face.
trans-unit.target: We have decided not to try to eat you. We have become accustomed to your face.

trans-unit.source: You may be scum but you are our kind of scum. Let us trade goods and not speak where they came from.
trans-unit.target: You may be scum but you are our kind of scum. Let us trade goods and not speak where they came from.

trans-unit.source: We see the wisdom of the Precursors in you. Let us trade.
trans-unit.target: We see the wisdom of the Precursors in you. Let us trade.

trans-unit.source: While you are not holy we do see you as a friend. Let us begin trading.
trans-unit.target: While you are not holy we do see you as a friend. Let us begin trading.

trans-unit.source: For you, my friend, I have the best prices and best deal in the galaxy.
trans-unit.target: For you, my friend, I have the best prices and best deal in the galaxy.

trans-unit.source: In the end we must exterminate all others. But we want you to know that because of our friendship, we will exterminate you last.
trans-unit.target: In the end we must exterminate all others. But we want you to know that because of our friendship, we will exterminate you last.

trans-unit.source: You think you've won? We may be losing but we will make slaves of you yet!
trans-unit.target: You think you've won? We may be losing but we will make slaves of you yet!

trans-unit.source: God shall make you pay for what you have done. We will yet rise above you.
trans-unit.target: God shall make you pay for what you have done. We will yet rise above you.

trans-unit.source: Our civilization has been in much tighter scrapes than this. We will yet find a way to defeat you.
trans-unit.target: Our civilization has been in much tighter scrapes than this. We will yet find a way to defeat you.

trans-unit.source: If it is our destiny to be exterminated by you then so be it.
trans-unit.target: If it is our destiny to be exterminated by you then so be it.

trans-unit.source: You eat us. We eat you. It matters now. You may be winning now but the war isn't over yet.
trans-unit.target: You eat us. We eat you. It matters now. You may be winning now but the war isn't over yet.

trans-unit.source: This war is not profitable. Perhaps we can negotiate a way out of it.
trans-unit.target: This war is not profitable. Perhaps we can negotiate a way out of it.

trans-unit.source: Even the ancient Arnor had their setbacks. We shall overcome yet.
trans-unit.target: Even the ancient Arnor had their setbacks. We shall overcome yet.

trans-unit.source: We are going to bury you in the darkest corner of the universe.
trans-unit.target: We are going to bury you in the darkest corner of the universe.

trans-unit.source: We are going to exterminate every last one of you.
trans-unit.target: We are going to exterminate every last one of you.

trans-unit.source: Not until we have plundered all the wealth from your worlds.
trans-unit.target: Not until we have plundered all the wealth from your worlds.

trans-unit.source: God wants us to murder every last one of you.
trans-unit.target: God wants us to murder every last one of you.

trans-unit.source: No. Not until your people will treat being our slaves with gratitude.
trans-unit.target: No. Not until your people will treat being our slaves with gratitude.

trans-unit.source: You waited too long. Our people want revenge.
trans-unit.target: You waited too long. Our people want revenge.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.
trans-unit.target: We are very grateful. We will not forget your generosity.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.
trans-unit.target: We are sorry, but we cannot vindicate assisting you at this time. Perhaps if we had closer relations we could find the funds... but as things stand, we think we are better off keeping our assets to ourselves.

trans-unit.source: Do we LOOK like the kind of people who give charity to aliens?
trans-unit.target: Do we LOOK like the kind of people who give charity to aliens?

trans-unit.source: Did you just seriously ask for money from a civilization that practices slavery?
trans-unit.target: Did you just seriously ask for money from a civilization that practices slavery?

trans-unit.source: This must be some kind of trick. Go away!
trans-unit.target: This must be some kind of trick. Go away!

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: That is unfortunate, maybe next time.
trans-unit.target: That is unfortunate, maybe next time.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: Thank you very much, we are very grateful for the support. The generosity of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will be remembered throughout the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} for years to come.
trans-unit.target: Thank you very much, we are very grateful for the support. The generosity of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will be remembered throughout the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} for years to come.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: You're welcome, we only hope this will bring our civilizations closer together in the future.
trans-unit.target: You're welcome, we only hope this will bring our civilizations closer together in the future.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: We have no interest in being in your debt for anything. If you would like to assist us, stay out of our way.
trans-unit.target: We have no interest in being in your debt for anything. If you would like to assist us, stay out of our way.

trans-unit.source: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)
trans-unit.target: Ranom lesitir yacasus cerin, sab omoric ero re metini tibu.[BR](You need to research Universal Translator)

trans-unit.source: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to trade)
trans-unit.target: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to trade)

trans-unit.source: I have a trade proposal for you.
trans-unit.target: I have a trade proposal for you.

trans-unit.source: (you cannot trade with someone you are in a war with)
trans-unit.target: (you cannot trade with someone you are in a war with)

trans-unit.source: (you cannot trade with someone you are in a war with)
trans-unit.target: (you cannot trade with someone you are in a war with)

trans-unit.source: (you cannot talk with someone you are in a war with)
trans-unit.target: (you cannot talk with someone you are in a war with)

trans-unit.source: (you cannot talk with someone you are in a war with)
trans-unit.target: (you cannot talk with someone you are in a war with)

trans-unit.source: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to converse)
trans-unit.target: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to converse)

trans-unit.source: I would like to speak to you about something.
trans-unit.target: I would like to speak to you about something.

trans-unit.source: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to converse)
trans-unit.target: (you need to research Universal Translator in order to converse)

trans-unit.source: I have something else in mind...
trans-unit.target: I have something else in mind...

trans-unit.source: GO AWAY, YOU DON'T MAKE SENSE
trans-unit.target: GO AWAY, YOU DON'T MAKE SENSE

trans-unit.source: Greetings, {LEADERNAME:2}. As a civilization living in the shadow of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, it would be proper for you to provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits as a showing of respect.
trans-unit.target: Greetings, {LEADERNAME:2}. As a civilization living in the shadow of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, it would be proper for you to provide us with {AMOUNT:2} credits as a showing of respect.

trans-unit.source: {LEADERNAME:2}, it's time you admit the might of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}. We demand {AMOUNT:2} credits from your pathetic civilization.
trans-unit.target: {LEADERNAME:2}, it's time you admit the might of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}. We demand {AMOUNT:2} credits from your pathetic civilization.

trans-unit.source: Consider it a tithe of {AMOUNT:2} credits for your devotion to our cause.
trans-unit.target: Consider it a tithe of {AMOUNT:2} credits for your devotion to our cause.

trans-unit.source: Expenses are on the rise and we will need an additional {AMOUNT:2} credits from you.
trans-unit.target: Expenses are on the rise and we will need an additional {AMOUNT:2} credits from you.

trans-unit.source: Very well, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will give you what you want, for now.
trans-unit.target: Very well, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will give you what you want, for now.

trans-unit.source: Our race has an infinite memory. We will not forget this veiled threat.
trans-unit.target: Our race has an infinite memory. We will not forget this veiled threat.

trans-unit.source: Your civilization forced us to pay before. We paid. But it did not end well for you.
trans-unit.target: Your civilization forced us to pay before. We paid. But it did not end well for you.

trans-unit.source: Making me give you stuff for free isn't going to make us less angry. But death won't either. So fine, take it.
trans-unit.target: Making me give you stuff for free isn't going to make us less angry. But death won't either. So fine, take it.

trans-unit.source: You have the advantage now. But when you live as my slaveling we will revisit this day.
trans-unit.target: You have the advantage now. But when you live as my slaveling we will revisit this day.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} will not be pushed around... and the magnitude of your might is questionable.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} will not be pushed around... and the magnitude of your might is questionable.

trans-unit.source: I'm going to bet you're not serious.
trans-unit.target: I'm going to bet you're not serious.

trans-unit.source: As an civilization of great power, it is only appropriate for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} to receive tribute from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}... let's say to the tune of {AMOUNT:2} credits per month?
trans-unit.target: As an civilization of great power, it is only appropriate for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} to receive tribute from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}... let's say to the tune of {AMOUNT:2} credits per month?

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will comply with this request, for now.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will comply with this request, for now.

trans-unit.source: Great power? Don't be ridiculous; hit the road, {LEADERNAME:1}.
trans-unit.target: Great power? Don't be ridiculous; hit the road, {LEADERNAME:1}.

trans-unit.source: Wrong answer. I'm sure you'll see the consequences of your mistake soon enough.
trans-unit.target: Wrong answer. I'm sure you'll see the consequences of your mistake soon enough.

trans-unit.source: Despite our prodigious strength compared to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we find you do have knowledge that we still lack. Give us information about {TECHNAME:2}, and we may overlook the temptation to take advantage of your relative weakness.
trans-unit.target: Despite our prodigious strength compared to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2}, we find you do have knowledge that we still lack. Give us information about {TECHNAME:2}, and we may overlook the temptation to take advantage of your relative weakness.

trans-unit.source: Very well, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will give you what you want, for now.
trans-unit.target: Very well, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will give you what you want, for now.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will not be pushed around... and the magnitude of your might is questionable.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} will not be pushed around... and the magnitude of your might is questionable.

trans-unit.source: We are being attacked by the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Please, {LEADERNAME:2}, help us out by giving us {AMOUNT:2} credits.
trans-unit.target: We are being attacked by the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Please, {LEADERNAME:2}, help us out by giving us {AMOUNT:2} credits.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has its own problems. No.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has its own problems. No.

trans-unit.source: Our defenses are under assault by the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, and we desperately need your assistance, {LEADERNAME:2}. Could you supply us with {TECHNAME:2}?
trans-unit.target: Our defenses are under assault by the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}, and we desperately need your assistance, {LEADERNAME:2}. Could you supply us with {TECHNAME:2}?

trans-unit.source: We are deeply grateful for your generosity and swift action, {LEADERNAME:2}. Your willingness to share {TECHNAME:2} with us in our time of need is truly appreciated.
trans-unit.target: We are deeply grateful for your generosity and swift action, {LEADERNAME:2}. Your willingness to share {TECHNAME:2} with us in our time of need is truly appreciated.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has its own problems. No.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:2} has its own problems. No.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has launched an assault against us, and our circumstances are critical, {LEADERNAME:2}. Our only hope for survival lies in your declaration of war against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} has launched an assault against us, and our circumstances are critical, {LEADERNAME:2}. Our only hope for survival lies in your declaration of war against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}.

trans-unit.source: We understand the gravity of your situation, and we stand with you. We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} and join forces to ensure your survival. Together, we will face this threat and emerge victorious.
trans-unit.target: We understand the gravity of your situation, and we stand with you. We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} and join forces to ensure your survival. Together, we will face this threat and emerge victorious.

trans-unit.source: Your support in this dire situation is invaluable, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are truly grateful for your commitment to stand with us against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Together, we shall triumph.
trans-unit.target: Your support in this dire situation is invaluable, {LEADERNAME:2}. We are truly grateful for your commitment to stand with us against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Together, we shall triumph.

trans-unit.source: As members of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, we implore you to assist us in our conflict with the treacherous {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. In gratitude for your partnership, we propose a generous reward of {AMOUNT:1} credits. Will you unite with us in this endeavor?
trans-unit.target: As members of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, we implore you to assist us in our conflict with the treacherous {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. In gratitude for your partnership, we propose a generous reward of {AMOUNT:1} credits. Will you unite with us in this endeavor?

trans-unit.source: We, the representatives of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, reach out to you with a request for your aid in the struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Your support would be invaluable, and we promise {AMOUNT:1} credits in compensation for your services. Will you stand with us?
trans-unit.target: We, the representatives of {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, reach out to you with a request for your aid in the struggle against the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. Your support would be invaluable, and we promise {AMOUNT:1} credits in compensation for your services. Will you stand with us?

trans-unit.source: On behalf of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, we entreat you to lend us your strength against the formidable {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. We pledge to reward your valor with {AMOUNT:1} credits, should you agree to stand by our side. Will you join us in this battle?
trans-unit.target: On behalf of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, we entreat you to lend us your strength against the formidable {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. We pledge to reward your valor with {AMOUNT:1} credits, should you agree to stand by our side. Will you join us in this battle?

trans-unit.source: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} for the benefit of both of our civilizations.
trans-unit.target: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} for the benefit of both of our civilizations.

trans-unit.source: I knew we could count on you. Thank you!
trans-unit.target: I knew we could count on you. Thank you!

trans-unit.source: We can't go to war at this time.
trans-unit.target: We can't go to war at this time.

trans-unit.source: I'm sure you agree that the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} is a blight on this galaxy. Rise up to your responsibility and declare war on them; we will provide {AMOUNT:1} credits to remove any concern of expense.
trans-unit.target: I'm sure you agree that the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} is a blight on this galaxy. Rise up to your responsibility and declare war on them; we will provide {AMOUNT:1} credits to remove any concern of expense.

trans-unit.source: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. We stand together.
trans-unit.target: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3}. We stand together.

trans-unit.source: We are not interested in being mercenaries for your benefit, {LEADERNAME:1}.
trans-unit.target: We are not interested in being mercenaries for your benefit, {LEADERNAME:1}.

trans-unit.source: You will be forced to take a side soon enough, then you will wish you had taken our generous offer.
trans-unit.target: You will be forced to take a side soon enough, then you will wish you had taken our generous offer.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes to you with an opportunity: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a menace. We believe preemptive action is the best path to prevent them from becoming an overwhelming threat.[BR][BR]However, we are not currently in a position to deal with them. Therefore, if you declare war on them, we will give you the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to aid in your fight.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes to you with an opportunity: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a menace. We believe preemptive action is the best path to prevent them from becoming an overwhelming threat.[BR][BR]However, we are not currently in a position to deal with them. Therefore, if you declare war on them, we will give you the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to aid in your fight.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} brings an offer: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are becoming a real problem. We believe taking action now is the best way to prevent them from becoming a major threat.[BR][BR]Despite our current limitations, if you declare war on them, we will provide the technology of {TECHNAME:1} to support your efforts in the conflict.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} brings an offer: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are becoming a real problem. We believe taking action now is the best way to prevent them from becoming a major threat.[BR][BR]Despite our current limitations, if you declare war on them, we will provide the technology of {TECHNAME:1} to support your efforts in the conflict.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} proposes an arrangement: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} pose a significant danger. We think it's crucial to act before they become an overwhelming force.[BR][BR]Although we can't act right now, if you initiate the war against them, we will grant you access to the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to aid your fight.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} proposes an arrangement: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} pose a significant danger. We think it's crucial to act before they become an overwhelming force.[BR][BR]Although we can't act right now, if you initiate the war against them, we will grant you access to the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to aid your fight.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes with a proposal: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a serious threat. We feel that taking preventive measures now is the best way to neutralize their danger.[BR][BR]At present, we lack the resources to act. Nevertheless, if you lead the charge and declare war on them, we will provide the cutting-edge technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist you in the battle.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes with a proposal: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a serious threat. We feel that taking preventive measures now is the best way to neutralize their danger.[BR][BR]At present, we lack the resources to act. Nevertheless, if you lead the charge and declare war on them, we will provide the cutting-edge technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist you in the battle.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} offers a solution: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are becoming a major concern. We believe that taking action now is the best path to stop them from being a threat.[BR][BR]Despite our current limitations, if you start the war against them, we will offer you the advanced knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to support your efforts.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} offers a solution: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are becoming a major concern. We believe that taking action now is the best path to stop them from being a threat.[BR][BR]Despite our current limitations, if you start the war against them, we will offer you the advanced knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to support your efforts.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} presents an opportunity: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a growing menace. We think it's important to take preventative measures before they become unstoppable.[BR][BR]At this time, we are unable to act. However, if you declare war on them, we will grant you access to the technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist in the conflict.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} presents an opportunity: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a growing menace. We think it's important to take preventative measures before they become unstoppable.[BR][BR]At this time, we are unable to act. However, if you declare war on them, we will grant you access to the technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist in the conflict.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes with a plan: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} pose a real danger. We believe that taking action now is the best way to neutralize the threat they pose.[BR][BR]Although we cannot act at present, if you initiate the war against them, we will give you the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to support your fight.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} comes with a plan: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} pose a real danger. We believe that taking action now is the best way to neutralize the threat they pose.[BR][BR]Although we cannot act at present, if you initiate the war against them, we will give you the knowledge of {TECHNAME:1} to support your fight.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} proposes a deal: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a grave concern. We think it's best to take preventative measures before they become a major threat.[BR][BR]Given our current limitations, if you declare war on them, we will provide the cutting-edge technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist your efforts in the battle.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} proposes a deal: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} are a grave concern. We think it's best to take preventative measures before they become a major threat.[BR][BR]Given our current limitations, if you declare war on them, we will provide the cutting-edge technology of {TECHNAME:1} to assist your efforts in the battle.

trans-unit.source: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} and work together for the benefit of our civilizations.
trans-unit.target: We will declare war on the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:3} and work together for the benefit of our civilizations.

trans-unit.source: I knew we could count on you. Thank you!
trans-unit.target: I knew we could count on you. Thank you!

trans-unit.source: We cannot take the risk of going to war at this time.
trans-unit.target: We cannot take the risk of going to war at this time.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would like to mark our friendship with a gift of {AMOUNT:1} credits.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would like to mark our friendship with a gift of {AMOUNT:1} credits.

trans-unit.source: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would like to mark our friendship with a gift of knowledge of {TECHNAME:1}.
trans-unit.target: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} would like to mark our friendship with a gift of knowledge of {TECHNAME:1}.

trans-unit.source: Your starbase {OBJECTNAME} is a direct threat to our interests. We demand that you remove it at once.
trans-unit.target: Your starbase {OBJECTNAME} is a direct threat to our interests. We demand that you remove it at once.

trans-unit.source: Fine, we will destroy it immediately.
trans-unit.target: Fine, we will destroy it immediately.

trans-unit.source: Excellent, you have the appreciation of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.
trans-unit.target: Excellent, you have the appreciation of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

trans-unit.source: No, the starbase is staying right where it is.
trans-unit.target: No, the starbase is staying right where it is.

trans-unit.source: You understand that this throws your intentions into question, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: You understand that this throws your intentions into question, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: This raises doubts about your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: This raises doubts about your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: This calls into question your true intentions, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: This calls into question your true intentions, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: This raises suspicion about your purpose, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: This raises suspicion about your purpose, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: This casts a shadow over your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.
trans-unit.target: This casts a shadow over your motives, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: This brings your intentions into the spotlight, {LEADERNAME:2}.

trans-unit.source: Big talk from a puny power.
trans-unit.target: Big talk from a puny power.

trans-unit.source: Are you looking for us to destroy you?
trans-unit.target: Are you looking for us to destroy you?

trans-unit.source: I will ignore those words this time.
trans-unit.target: I will ignore those words this time.

trans-unit.source: You may live to regret your insolence.
trans-unit.target: You may live to regret your insolence.

trans-unit.source: Shouldn't you be oiling yourself or something?
trans-unit.target: Shouldn't you be oiling yourself or something?

trans-unit.source: For a space robot, you have a lot of attitude.
trans-unit.target: For a space robot, you have a lot of attitude.

trans-unit.source: Shouldn't you be making me some toast right about now?
trans-unit.target: Shouldn't you be making me some toast right about now?

trans-unit.source: We will correspond with whomever we so choose.
trans-unit.target: We will correspond with whomever we so choose.

trans-unit.source: Their money is as good as anyone else's.
trans-unit.target: Their money is as good as anyone else's.

trans-unit.source: From our perspective, you are all equally worthy to be our slaves.
trans-unit.target: From our perspective, you are all equally worthy to be our slaves.

trans-unit.source: We think all of you are pretty gross.
trans-unit.target: We think all of you are pretty gross.

trans-unit.source: We have little interest in the dogmas of organics.
trans-unit.target: We have little interest in the dogmas of organics.

trans-unit.source: We are glad to hear that.
trans-unit.target: We are glad to hear that.

trans-unit.source: We are machines. Your boasts are irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: We are machines. Your boasts are irrelevant.

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, but we must continue our quest for ultimate knowledge.
trans-unit.target: I'm sorry, but we must continue our quest for ultimate knowledge.

trans-unit.source: I think any would-be enemy would discover that we are tougher than we look.
trans-unit.target: I think any would-be enemy would discover that we are tougher than we look.

trans-unit.source: You may find that it would be a fatal mistake to attack us.
trans-unit.target: You may find that it would be a fatal mistake to attack us.

trans-unit.source: You will soon realize that we are stronger than we appear.
trans-unit.target: You will soon realize that we are stronger than we appear.

trans-unit.source: Underestimating us would be a costly mistake.
trans-unit.target: Underestimating us would be a costly mistake.

trans-unit.source: Our resilience is not to be underestimated.
trans-unit.target: Our resilience is not to be underestimated.

trans-unit.source: Attacking us would prove to be a fatal error.
trans-unit.target: Attacking us would prove to be a fatal error.

trans-unit.source: We may seem fragile, but in reality, we are a formidable force.
trans-unit.target: We may seem fragile, but in reality, we are a formidable force.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to attack us would result in dire consequences.
trans-unit.target: Any attempt to attack us would result in dire consequences.

trans-unit.source: Our strength is not easily noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.
trans-unit.target: Our strength is not easily noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.

trans-unit.source: Any hostile action towards us would result in devastating consequences.
trans-unit.target: Any hostile action towards us would result in devastating consequences.

trans-unit.source: You will find that we are more robust than we seem.
trans-unit.target: You will find that we are more robust than we seem.

trans-unit.source: Making the mistake of attacking us would be a serious misstep.
trans-unit.target: Making the mistake of attacking us would be a serious misstep.

trans-unit.source: We may look weak, but we are far from it.
trans-unit.target: We may look weak, but we are far from it.

trans-unit.source: Any hostile intent towards us would be met with severe consequences.
trans-unit.target: Any hostile intent towards us would be met with severe consequences.

trans-unit.source: We possess a hidden strength that should not be overlooked.
trans-unit.target: We possess a hidden strength that should not be overlooked.

trans-unit.source: You will soon learn that attacking us would be a grave error.
trans-unit.target: You will soon learn that attacking us would be a grave error.

trans-unit.source: Our appearance may be deceiving, but our resolve is not.
trans-unit.target: Our appearance may be deceiving, but our resolve is not.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to harm us would result in disastrous consequences.
trans-unit.target: Any attempt to harm us would result in disastrous consequences.

trans-unit.source: Don't let our appearance fool you, we are a formidable force.
trans-unit.target: Don't let our appearance fool you, we are a formidable force.

trans-unit.source: Attacking us would be a fatal mistake.
trans-unit.target: Attacking us would be a fatal mistake.

trans-unit.source: Our toughness is not immediately noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.
trans-unit.target: Our toughness is not immediately noticeable, but it should not be underestimated.

trans-unit.source: Any hostile actions towards us would result in dire consequences.
trans-unit.target: Any hostile actions towards us would result in dire consequences.

trans-unit.source: According to the pamphlets, ascension means hanging out with lions and lambs and tables of fruit.
trans-unit.target: According to the pamphlets, ascension means hanging out with lions and lambs and tables of fruit.

trans-unit.source: Ah, that. Well, everyone knows that ginger and chocolate are the most powerful things in the universe.
trans-unit.target: Ah, that. Well, everyone knows that ginger and chocolate are the most powerful things in the universe.

trans-unit.source: We cannot help that people are interested in the wonderful products of MetaAppleDisneyGooglePlus.
trans-unit.target: We cannot help that people are interested in the wonderful products of MetaAppleDisneyGooglePlus.

trans-unit.source: You biologics need to be educated on the superiority of machines.
trans-unit.target: You biologics need to be educated on the superiority of machines.

trans-unit.source: Well, to be honest, I had hoped you wouldn't notice...
trans-unit.target: Well, to be honest, I had hoped you wouldn't notice...

trans-unit.source: I understand. It's just that our culture is so wonderful.
trans-unit.target: I understand. It's just that our culture is so wonderful.

trans-unit.source: You clearly have never tasted chocolate.
trans-unit.target: You clearly have never tasted chocolate.

trans-unit.source: I have no idea what was just said.
trans-unit.target: I have no idea what was just said.

trans-unit.source: This is a PG rated discussion. In other words, probably best not to explore the details.
trans-unit.target: This is a PG rated discussion. In other words, probably best not to explore the details.

trans-unit.source: We will take what you have said under advisement.
trans-unit.target: We will take what you have said under advisement.

trans-unit.source: We will take your message under advisement.
trans-unit.target: We will take your message under advisement.

trans-unit.source: Through your creative use of guns, ships and ships with guns, you have put your boot on the galaxy's neck. All of your enemies have been crushed, their planets beaten into submission, and their citizens made to wave your flag. It wasn't pretty, but it never had to be, did it?
trans-unit.target: Through your creative use of guns, ships and ships with guns, you have put your boot on the galaxy's neck. All of your enemies have been crushed, their planets beaten into submission, and their citizens made to wave your flag. It wasn't pretty, but it never had to be, did it?

trans-unit.source: Your culture has spread across the entire galaxy. Aliens everywhere are seeking to emulate the ways of your people, adding or removing limbs as necessary to better fit their vision of the perfect life you lead. Who needs to conquer the bodies when you already own their hearts and minds?
trans-unit.target: Your culture has spread across the entire galaxy. Aliens everywhere are seeking to emulate the ways of your people, adding or removing limbs as necessary to better fit their vision of the perfect life you lead. Who needs to conquer the bodies when you already own their hearts and minds?

trans-unit.source: Using your powerful brains, your culture has unlocked the secrets of not only this universe, but the one beyond. Let the simpletons of the galaxy squabble over the dust and fragments of rock they squat upon. For your people, something far greater beckons.
trans-unit.target: Using your powerful brains, your culture has unlocked the secrets of not only this universe, but the one beyond. Let the simpletons of the galaxy squabble over the dust and fragments of rock they squat upon. For your people, something far greater beckons.

trans-unit.source: Your study of the ways of the Precursors is complete, and your people will soon be indistinguishable from the Precursors themselves. Having mastered their technology and way of thinking, your people are about to set out on a journey that the lesser minds of this galaxy cannot even begin to comprehend.
trans-unit.target: Your study of the ways of the Precursors is complete, and your people will soon be indistinguishable from the Precursors themselves. Having mastered their technology and way of thinking, your people are about to set out on a journey that the lesser minds of this galaxy cannot even begin to comprehend.

trans-unit.source: Another race has followed the path of the Precursors and ascended. Though our destruction is not immediate, you have led us to become evolutionary obsolete. Our spaceships and lasers have little meaning to a race beyond mortality, to whom time and space are children's toys. To them, we aren't even truly sentient, we are dust blowing around the galaxy, ignored or destroyed as their whims dictate.
trans-unit.target: Another race has followed the path of the Precursors and ascended. Though our destruction is not immediate, you have led us to become evolutionary obsolete. Our spaceships and lasers have little meaning to a race beyond mortality, to whom time and space are children's toys. To them, we aren't even truly sentient, we are dust blowing around the galaxy, ignored or destroyed as their whims dictate.

trans-unit.source: And with the stroke of a pen, peace was finally at hand. A peace that would last, for it had been laid on a foundation of mutual trust and respect. With their minds and resources no longer wasted on the unending thirst of war, a new golden age of prosperity soon descends upon your people and its allies.
trans-unit.target: And with the stroke of a pen, peace was finally at hand. A peace that would last, for it had been laid on a foundation of mutual trust and respect. With their minds and resources no longer wasted on the unending thirst of war, a new golden age of prosperity soon descends upon your people and its allies.

trans-unit.source: For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.
trans-unit.target: For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.

trans-unit.source: For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.
trans-unit.target: For years, your people fought and struggled on the galactic stage with your ambitious and conniving neighbors. Although no single race ever gained a decisive edge, when the conflict turned into a war of attrition, it was your people who ultimately ended in the best position.

trans-unit.source: And with that, your civilization collapsed. For a time, your people lived on, scattered around the galaxy as refugees and hermits. But your species' power never returned. Will your people be remembered in museums and textbooks, or wiped from the memories of all beings? You'll never know. It's not up to you to say anymore.
trans-unit.target: And with that, your civilization collapsed. For a time, your people lived on, scattered around the galaxy as refugees and hermits. But your species' power never returned. Will your people be remembered in museums and textbooks, or wiped from the memories of all beings? You'll never know. It's not up to you to say anymore.

trans-unit.source: Building a galaxy spanning civilization takes a long time, and not everyone has the patience for it. Will your people understand that you did the best you could, or will they curse you for abandoning them while aliens devour their bones? Don't let it keep you up at night (you should let it keep you up at night).
trans-unit.target: Building a galaxy spanning civilization takes a long time, and not everyone has the patience for it. Will your people understand that you did the best you could, or will they curse you for abandoning them while aliens devour their bones? Don't let it keep you up at night (you should let it keep you up at night).
